GS41aryabhcu:5174: atra ucyate ã “varṣam dvādaśa māsāḥ” iti ādi na ārabdhavyam,
GS41aryabhcu:5176: sarveṣu eva ayam nyāyaḥ lokavedaprasiddhyā aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5177: “varṣam dvādaśamāsāḥ” iti ādi vinā api lakṣaṇena lokaḥ jānīte,
GS41aryabhcu:5179: yadi lokaprasiddham api abhidhīyate tadā atra bahu vaktavyam jāyate /
GS41aryabhcu:5185: atha yadi api lokaprasiddhiḥ aṅgīkriyate tathā api tu “vargākṣarāṇi varge” [gītikāí,
GS41aryabhcu:5193: 2] iti atra vargāvargākṣarasvaranirūpaṇāyām vyākaraṇam abāhyam śāstram /
GS41aryabhcu:5196: yadi “varṣam dvādaśa māsāḥ” iti ādi granthaḥ na ārabhyate tadā etat sarvam lokaprasiddhyā setsyati /
GS41aryabhcu:5199: anārabhyamāṇāyām asyām paribhāṣāyām sāvanasya eva mānasya ete bhedāḥ syuḥ na sauracāndranākṣatrāṇām,
GS41aryabhcu:5200: yasmāt sāvanam eva ekam mānam lokaprasiddham,
GS41aryabhcu:5202: tat sarveṣu eva māneṣu iyam eva paribhāṣā yathā syāt iti [sūtram ārabdhavyam] /
GS41aryabhcu:5203: anyathā hi “ravimāsebhyaḥ adhikāḥ tu ye cāndrāḥ” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:5204: 6] iti atra ravibhagaṇānām dvādaśa guṇakāraḥ na labhyeta,
GS41aryabhcu:5206: 6] iti atra śaśidivasānām triṃśatkaḥ guṇakāraḥ na labhyeta,
GS41aryabhcu:5207: “ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ divasaḥ” iti atra api horāśāstrāvirodhena ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ parikalpitāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5208: anyathā hi icchayā vibhāgaḥ divasasya śakyate parikalpayitum /
GS41aryabhcu:5209: icchayā vibhāge parikalpyamāne kaḥ punar horāśāstravirodhaḥ?
GS41aryabhcu:5211: ādyantarāśyorudayapramāṇam dvau dvau muhūrtau niyatam pradiṣṭau /
GS41aryabhcu:5213: sā ca nāḍikā divasasya ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5214: anyathā parikalpyamāne ayam arthaḥ anyathā syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:5215: katham punar divasasya ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ sādhyate iti atra abhidhīyate ã atra kecit bruvate
GS41aryabhcu:5219: yāvat palāni ṣaṣṭiḥ pānīyam prasravati āpūryate vā,
GS41aryabhcu:5221: prājñāḥ tu na evam iti manyante /
GS41aryabhcu:5223: ahorātraprasrutasya pānīyasya ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ ghaṭikāpramāṇaḥ iti sthūlaḥ kalpaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5225: nirdiṣṭākārasya śaṅkoḥ ghaṭikācchāyām aṅkayitvā ghaṭikā sādhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:5227: gurvakṣarāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ vināḍikā ārkṣī ṣaṭ eva vā prāṇāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5230: gurūṇi ca tāni akṣarāṇi ca gurvakṣarāṇi,
GS41aryabhcu:5232: yāvatā kālena ṣaṣṭiḥ gurvakṣarāṇi paṭhitāni tāvān kālaḥ vināḍīsaṃjñitaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5233: “gurvakṣarāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ vināḍikā” iti anena sarveṣām eva saurasāvananākṣatracāndrāṇām mānānām vināḍikākālatulyatāyām prasaktāyām tadviṣayanirūpaṇārtham āha ã ārkṣī /
GS41aryabhcu:5240: ayam ca kālaḥ vināḍikābhidhīyamānaḥ strītvam pratipadyate iti strīliṅganirdeśena vināḍikā iti uktam /
GS41aryabhcu:5245: yataḥ āha ã “prāṇena eti kalām bham” [gītikāí, 6] iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5248: atra ārkṣī vināḍikā ṣaṭ vā prāṇāḥ [tulyāḥ] /
GS41aryabhcu:5250: ataḥ jyotiścakrasambandhinaḥ prāṇāḥ liptāsaṅkhyāḥ iti prāṇaiḥ jyādikarma pravartate /
GS41aryabhcu:5252: [giītikāí, 12] iti uktatvāt prāṇaiḥ jyāgrahaṇam na prāpnoti /
GS41aryabhcu:5253: anyat ca ã sāmānyena eva “ṣaṭ vā prāṇāḥ vināḍikā” it ucyamāne sarvamānānām eva vināḍikākālasya tulyatāprasaṅgaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5254: avaśiṣṭānām mānānām vināḍikāyāḥ pramāṇam nāḍikāyāḥ ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ eva /
GS41aryabhcu:5258: “gurvakṣarāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ” iti atra madhyamāyām vṛttau ṣaṣṭiḥ gurvakṣarāṇi vināḍikākālaḥ iti vaktavyam /
GS41aryabhcu:5259: anyathā hi tisṛṣu api vṛttiṣu aviśeṣeṇa grahaṇam prāpnoti /
GS41aryabhcu:5260: tat yathā ã drutāyām vṛttau ṣaṣṭiḥ gurvakṣarāṇi alpena kālena paṭhyante,
GS41aryabhcu:5267: / tat yathā ã loke anirdiṣṭeṣu kāryeṣu madhyamaprāptiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5268: evam atra api ã “māsānte pakṣasya ante sa hi ākāśe deśe svam miśram vakram kāntam
GS41aryabhcu:5269: vṛttam pūrṇam candram sattvāt rātrau te kṣutkṣāma prādante śvetaḥ prājyaḥ krūraḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5270: tasmāt vā ante harmyasya antaḥ saṃsuptasya ekānte kartavyā” /
GS41aryabhcu:5274: te vā ṣaṭ, tasyāḥ eva arkṣyavināḍikāyāḥ kālaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5275: atra api svasthasya aśrāntasya nīrujasya yoginaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5277: atra api svasthaḥ na mahatā kālena ucchvasiti /
GS41aryabhcu:5279: yogī na punar vyānavaśān mahatā kālena ucchvasiti /
GS41aryabhcu:5280: atra truṭi-truṭyavayavādayaḥ kālāvayavāḥ kasmāt na ucyante?
GS41aryabhcu:5281: evam manyante ã taiḥ vyavahāraḥ na asti iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5285: kim artham idam abhidhīyate ã “evam kālavibhāgaḥ” iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5287: evam tasya nirdiṣṭasya grahaṇam “evam kālavibhāgaḥ” iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5288: asya anabhidhānāt śakyate jñātum yathā aprapañcitapramāṇaḥ kālavibhāgaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5291: prakārārthe tu vyākhyāyamāne anye api kālavibhāgāḥ parigṛhītāḥ bhavanti
GS41aryabhcu:5312: ṣaṣṭiḥ tatparā viliptā iti īdṛśaḥ / uddeśakaḥ ã
GS41aryabhcu:5313: bhagaṇaḥ rāśiḥ bhāgaḥ kalā ca vikalā ca tatparā ca eva /
GS41aryabhcu:5314: kṣetrasya etāḥ saṃjñāḥ kālavibhāgena tulyāḥ syuḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:5317: bhagaṇāḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ye viśeṣaśeṣāḥ yuge dviyogāḥ te /
GS41aryabhcu:5321: dvayoḥ dvayoḥ grahayoḥ bhagaṇānām ye viśeṣaśeṣāḥ bhagaṇāḥ tāvantaḥ tayoḥ yuge dviyogāḥ babhūvuḥ bhaviṣyanti vā /
GS41aryabhcu:5322: atra dvayoḥ dvayoḥ bhagaṇaviśeṣāḥ eva tayoḥ yogāḥ iti katham avasīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:5323: na punar tayoḥ abhyāsaḥ yogaḥ vā? ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:5324: tat yathā ã dvau aśvau ca parimaṇḍalārohe parikalpitau /
GS41aryabhcu:5328: mahati maṇḍale yāvat maṇḍalacaturbhāgam gacchati tāvat alpe maṇḍale ardham gacchati /
GS41aryabhcu:5329: yāvat mahati maṇḍale ardham gacchati tāvat sakalam alpamaṇdalam gacchati /
GS41aryabhcu:5330: evam yāvat mahati maṇḍale ekaḥ parāvartaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5336: uddeśakaḥ ã guroḥ aṅgārakasya ca yuge kiyantaḥ yogāḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5339: kaḥ punar atra dviyogānām viniyogaḥ? ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:5341: [tarhi] kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti labdham samatikrāntāḥ dviyogāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5344: [śeṣam ṣaṣṭyā saṅguṇya yugadviyogaiḥ vibhajet labdham ghaṭyādi /
GS41aryabhcu:5345: ] yadi caturyugāhargaṇena iṣṭagrahayoḥ dviyogāḥ labhyante [tarhi] kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti labdham samatikrāntāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5347: taiḥ dviyogarāśyādibhiḥ mandagatigrahaḥ yuktaḥ śīghragatigrahaḥ bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:5348: śīghragatiḥ ca dviyogarāśyādihīnaḥ mandagatiḥ bhavati iti aparaḥ viniyogaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5349: dviyogaiḥ ca rāśyādīn ānīya tayoḥ api bhagaṇasamāsena api bhagaṇasamāsagatabhagaṇarāśyādīn vidhāya “antarayuktam hīnam” [gaṇitaí,
GS41aryabhcu:5350: 24] iti anena ekatra kṣipet ekatra viśodhayet,
GS41aryabhcu:5351: kṣiptaviśodhitayoḥ ardham tayoḥ gatabhagaṇarāśibhāgaliptāḥ iti anyaḥ viniyogaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5367: te eva vyatīpātāḥ dviguṇitāḥ iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5370: atra idam praṣṭavyam ã [kim idam] vyatīpātayoḥ udāharaṇam āhosvit lakṣaṇam iti?
GS41aryabhcu:5371: yadi idam udāharaṇam tadā sarvam iṣṭam setsyati,
GS41aryabhcu:5373: tat yathā ã candrādityau sphuṭīkṛtau yadi ekatra dvādaśarāśayaḥ tadā vyatīpātaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5374: nanu ca loke dvādaśarāśikaḥ vaidhṛtaḥ iti prasiddham ?
GS41aryabhcu:5377: yasmāt vyatīpātasya vaidhṛtasya ca tulyam phalam
GS41aryabhcu:5379: tau eva sūryācandramasau sphuṭau ekatra yadi ṣaḍrāśayaḥ tadā api vyatīpātaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5380: atha vyatīpātasya atītaiṣyaparijñānārtham trairāśikam ã yadi sūryācandramasoḥ sphuṭabhuktisamāsena ṣaṣṭighaṭikāḥ labhyante,
GS41aryabhcu:5381: [tadā] anena atītaiṣyeṇa kiyatya iti labhdam ghaṭikāḥ vighaṭikāḥ ca /
GS41aryabhcu:5383: tadā atītaiṣyeṇa saha trairāśikam ã yadi sūryācandramasoḥ sphuṭabhuktisamāsena sūryabhuktiḥ candrabhuktiḥ vā labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:5384: [tadā] anena atītaiṣyasūryācandramasoḥ bhuktisamāsena kim iti bhuktiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5385: labhyate / tena rahitau sahitau sūryācandramasau vyatīpātakālikau /
GS41aryabhcu:5387: yathā sūkṣmā bhavati tathā pradarśyate / uktam ca ã
GS41aryabhcu:5389: uddeśaḥ tasya cakrārdham vikṣepam ca adhikonakam //
GS41aryabhcu:5391: iti / sūryācandramasau nānāyane tulyāpakramau yadā bhavataḥ tadā vyatīpātaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5404: mandoccasya yadi api gatiḥ abhyupagatā tathā api yugabhagaṇasya vyavahāraḥ na asti iti śīghroccabhagaṇāḥ eva parigṛhyante /
GS41aryabhcu:5406: uccabhagaṇānām svabhagaṇānām ca yaḥ viśeṣaḥ sa uccanīcaparivartaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5407: / yasmāt nairaṃśyāt yāvat nairaṃśyam tāvat udayāstamayavakrānuvakrāḥ bhavanti iti uccaparivartaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5408: ye niraṃśadvayāntare divasāḥ te parivartasya divasāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5409: parivartāḥ grahāḥ ca yugādau meṣāditaḥ pravṛttāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5414: yasmāt ekasmin niraṃśadvayāntareṣu grahasya uccanīcaprāptī saṃbhavataḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5417: yatra grahāḥ sūkṣmāḥ lakṣyante karṇasya mahattvāt sa ākāśapradeśaḥ uccasaṃjñitaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5418: yatra asau eva grahaḥ mahābimbaḥ lakṣyate karṇasya alpatvāt sa ākāśapradeśaḥ nīcasaṃjñitaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5419: atha parivartaiḥ api uccam kendram vā ānīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:5420: katham? yadi caturyugāhargaṇena ete uccanīcaparivartāḥ labhyante,
GS41aryabhcu:5421: tadā kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti labdham samatikrāntāḥ parivartāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5423: parivartabhogarahitaḥ grahaḥ grahasahitaḥ vā parivartabhogaḥ uccabhogaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5428: atha “bhagaṇāḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ye viśeṣaśeṣāḥ yuge dviyogāḥ te” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:5429: 3] iti asyām eva kārikāyām nanu gataḥ ayam arthaḥ kim atra abhidhīyate?
GS41aryabhcu:5432: atha ca tat dvayoḥ dvayoḥ grahayoḥ bhagaṇaviśeṣaḥ iti abhihitaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5445: guroḥ abdāḥ guroḥ saṃvatsarāḥ iti arthaḥ /

GS41aryabhcu:5453: katham idam vijñāyate aśvayujādyāḥ samāḥ iti ?
GS41aryabhcu:5454: ucyate ã “aśvayujādyāḥ guroḥ abdāḥ” iti vacanāt /
GS41aryabhcu:5455: nanu tat eva vacanam asmābhiḥ coditam parihāraḥ api asmābhiḥ ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:5456: yasmāt yugādau aśvinyām amarapatigururudayaśikhariśikharamadhirūḍhaḥ tasmāt aśvayujādyāḥ guroḥ samāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5461: atha vasuvasurasākāśamunidahanakṛtasaṅkhyaiḥ [4370688] trairāśikena bṛhaspatiḥ api ānīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:5462: katham? yadi caturyugāhargaṇena vasuvasvādayaḥ bṛhaspatirāśayaḥ labhyante,
GS41aryabhcu:5466: ye samatikrāntāḥ guroḥ rāśayaḥ te samatikrāntāḥ guroḥ aśvayujādyāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5468: atha vasuvasvādayaḥ guroḥ saṃvatsarāḥ iti abhidhīyante /
GS41aryabhcu:5469: nanu ca taiḥ yugasaṃvatsaraiḥ tulyaiḥ bhavitavyam? na iti āha /
GS41aryabhcu:5470: ye yugasaṃvatsarāḥ te sauryeṇa mānena dṛṣṭāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5471: am ca ye guroḥ abdāḥ te gurumānena /
GS41aryabhcu:5472: ttat eva yugam sauryeṇa anumīyamānam gaganajaladabindume[gha]yamahutāśakṛta [4320000] saṅkhyam /
GS41aryabhcu:5474: bārhaspatyābdam bṛhaspateḥ rāśibhogaḥ iti na sauryabārhaspatyau tulyau iti // 4 //
GS41aryabhcu:5478: ravibhūyogāḥ divasāḥ bhāvartāḥ ca api nākṣatrāḥ // 5 //
GS41aryabhcu:5484: ye eva ravibhagaṇāḥ te eva ravyabdāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5485: tathā idam anuktam api gamyate ravirāśi-bhāga-liptā ravimāsa-divasa-nāḍyaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5489: ṣaḍrāśayaḥ ayanam uttaram dakṣiṇam ca makarakulīrāditaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5490: katham idam avasīyate makarakulīrāditaḥ iti na punar dhaniṣṭhādeḥ āśleṣārdhāt iti,
GS41aryabhcu:5498: śrutismṛtyoḥ punar bhede yā ca smṛtiḥ pratyakṣāviruddhā sā parigṛhyate /

GS41aryabhcu:5501: katham? yasmāt dhanuṣaḥ ante makarādisthite vidhvastāśeṣadhvāntasaṃghāte bhagavati bhāskare dinamadhyaṃgate
GS41aryabhcu:5503: sā ca krameṇa apacīyamānā makarāditaḥ eva,
GS41aryabhcu:5505: yat ca karkaṭādau sarvamadhyāhnacchāyābhyaḥ svalpīyasī madhyāhnacchāyā,
GS41aryabhcu:5506: sā ca krameṇa upacīyamānā karkaṭāditaḥ eva,
GS41aryabhcu:5507: na aśleṣārdhāt iti ataḥ pratyakṣasiddham ayanam /

GS41aryabhcu:5510: ã yadā bhavagān bhāskaraḥ ardhāśleṣāt dakṣiṇam mārgam pravartate punar vasvoḥ caturthāṃśadim
GS41aryabhcu:5512: yadā ca makarādim parityajya śraviṣṭhādeḥ uttaram [mārgam] pratipadyate tadā ca tatphalārthatvam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5513: atha ayam vivasvān katham evam pravartate iti?

GS41aryabhcu:5517: yadā punar karkaṭamakarādim aprāptvā eva dakṣiṇottarapravṛttinivṛttī bhavataḥ tadā akṣemā asasyā asubhikṣā iti etat pradarśayati /
GS41aryabhcu:5518: api atra aviditaparamārthāḥ romakāḥ paṭhanti ã
GS41aryabhcu:5520: mṛgakarkyāditaḥ dṛṣṭam katham tat hi gateḥ vinā //
GS41aryabhcu:5525: atra katham idam ghaṭate yadi utkrameṇa kramāt vā punar vasvoḥ meṣādeḥ api dakṣiṇāyanam pravartate na karkaṭādau eva?
GS41aryabhcu:5526: tathā ca varṣāṛtuḥ meṣādeḥ pravarteta [makarādeḥ] vasantaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5528: evam ca śrutyarthaḥ na anuṣṭhitaḥ bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:5536: idam ca jyotiṣām ayanam aṅgam vedasya /
GS41aryabhcu:5540: makarādau udagayanam dakṣiṇam ayanam ca candrabhavanādau /
GS41aryabhcu:5546: anyat ca ã apakramavṛddhiḥ dhanuḥ mithunānte eva iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5551: atha idam praṣṭavyam ã sphuṭagatyā parigahyante āhosvit madhyamagatyā iti /
GS41aryabhcu:5553: [tadā] yāni sauryamānābhihitāni prayojanāni tāni madhyamagatyā prāpnuvanti,
GS41aryabhcu:5555: kāni punar tāni prayojanāni iti? ucyate ã
GS41aryabhcu:5556: vāyoḥ mūrcchanam abhrāṇām utpattiḥ cakṣuṣoḥ balam /
GS41aryabhcu:5558: sattvānām madalābhāḥ syuḥ ārtavaḥ ca api yoṣitām /
GS41aryabhcu:5560: ayanānā[m ṛtūnām] ca muhūrtānām ca darśanam /
GS41aryabhcu:5563: ulkānām aśanīnām ca sandhyayoḥ vidyutām tathā //

GS41aryabhcu:5951: piṭrṇām yat varṣam tat dvādaśaguṇitam ekam varṣam devānām,
GS41aryabhcu:5958: yat etat divyam varṣam tat dvādaśabhiḥ sahasreṇa guṇitam grahasāmānyam yugam /
GS41aryabhcu:5961: yasmāt sarve grahāḥ sahaśīghroccaiḥ yugapat mīnameṣasandhau bhavanti,
GS41aryabhcu:5965: asmākam tu yugapādāḥ sarve eva ca tulyakālāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5967: catvāri āhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇām yat kṛtam yugam /
GS41aryabhcu:5968: tasya tāvat śatī sandhyā sandhyāṃśaḥ ca tathāvidhaḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:5977: kim punar atra yuktam ã purāṇakāraiḥ yathā bhinnapramāṇāni kṛtādīni vyākhyātāni tathā pratipattum,
GS41aryabhcu:5978: āhosvit yathā asmākam ācāryeṇa pratipāditāni samapramāṇāni
GS41aryabhcu:5979: iti? yathā asmākam prasiddhāni tathā iti āha /
GS41aryabhcu:5981: tadā kaliyugādau grahāḥ mīnameṣasandhau yugapat madhyamagatyā na syuḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:5984: etaiḥ ahargaṇam utpādya yathāvihitamadhyamagrahagaṇitaprakriyāyām yugapat mīnameṣasandhau
GS41aryabhcu:5987: api grahagatyām sādhyamānāyām eva iṣṭagrahāṇām gatiḥ na labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:5988: yadi punar samam eva kṛtādīnām pramāṇam tat idam trayāṇām api yugapādānām pramāṇam viyadambarākāśaśūnyakṛtayamāgnayaḥ [3240000],
GS41aryabhcu:5990: tasmāt “yathā asmākam prasiddhāni ” iti suṣṭhu uktam /
GS41aryabhcu:5992: grahayugam iti yat etat grahasāmānyam yugam tat parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:5993: tat aṣṭottareṇa sahasreṇa guṇitam prajāpateḥ ekadivasapramāṇam bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:5994: nanu ca atra api paurāṇikaiḥ saha virudhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6000: atra ca aṣṭottaram sahasram caturyugānām iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6002: paurāṇikaiḥ ã “sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yat brahmaṇaḥ viduḥ” iti abhidhāya taiḥ eva ekasaptatiḥ caturyugānām manvantaram caturdaśa manavaḥ brāhmaḥ divasaḥ iti [abhihitam] /
GS41aryabhcu:6003: atra ekasaptatiḥ caturdaśaguṇitā sahasrasaṅkhyām na prāpnoti /
GS41aryabhcu:6004: ucyate ca ã caturdaśa manvantarāṇi brahmaṇaḥ divasaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6007: aṣṭottarasahasram brāhmaḥ divasaḥ iti yuktisiddham etam /
GS41aryabhcu:6008: katham punar idam jñāyate dvāsaptatiḥ caturyugānām manvantaram iti?
GS41aryabhcu:6010: kāhaḥ manavaḥ ḍha manuyugāḥ śkha / iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6014: utsarpiṇī yugārdham paścāt apasarpiṇī yugārdham ca /
GS41aryabhcu:6015: madhye yugasya suṣamā ādau ante duṣṣamā indūccāt // 9 //
GS41aryabhcu:6016: utsarpiṇī nāma yasmin prāṇinām āyuryaśovīryasaukhyādīni upacīyante sa kālaḥ utasrpiṇīsaṃjñakaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6022: paścāt iti anena ustarpiṇīkālānantaram apasarpiṇīkālam darśayati /
GS41aryabhcu:6023: yasmāt pūrvapravṛttasya paścāt iti vyapadeśaḥ bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:6026: tasya ca pramāṇam yugasya paścārdham viyadambarākāśaśūnyarasenduyamāḥ [2160000] /
GS41aryabhcu:6027: evam ca ã madhye yugasya suṣamādau ante duṣṣamenūccāt /
GS41aryabhcu:6028: tasya pūrvārdhasya madhye suṣamā duṣṣamā ca /
GS41aryabhcu:6035: indūccāt niṣpannāt yugāt ete utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣamākālāḥ avagantavyāḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6042: tat yathā ã raveḥ maṇḍalāni ṣaṇmuniśarāḥ [576],
GS41aryabhcu:6047: ucyate ã caitraśuklapratipadi ardhodite savitari laṅkāyām mīnameṣasandhau pravṛttaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6048: grahaḥ punar mīnameṣasandhau caitraśuklapratipadi savituḥ ardhodaye laṅkāyām yāvatā
GS41aryabhcu:6049: kālena prāpnoti tāvat kālaḥ yugam iti / uktam ca ã
GS41aryabhcu:6053: bhinnāgreṣu yugeṣu ekāgrīkaraṇam kuṭṭākāreṇa abhihitam ã “kaścit dvābhyām ekāgraḥ tribhiḥ dvyagraḥ” iti ādi /
GS41aryabhcu:6054: athavā indūccāt nimittāt utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣamāṇām gatagantavyam vijñeyam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6055: katham punar gatagantavyaparijñānasya indūccanimittatvam pratipadyate iti ?
GS41aryabhcu:6057: yasmāt indūccayātāgrasya indūccabhagaṇāḥ yugavarṣāṇi yugadivasāḥ [vā] bhājyabhāgahāratām pratipadyante /
GS41aryabhcu:6060: niśīthinīnām adhipasya tuṅgajam gatam tu rāśitritayam yadā bhavet /
GS41aryabhcu:6061: tadā kiyat yātam atha āśu gaṇyatām yugasya varṣāgradināgratām ca me // 1 //
GS41aryabhcu:6064: athavā ayam aparaḥ prakāraḥ ã utsarpiṇī yugārdham /
GS41aryabhcu:6069: sā punar kiyantam kālam utsarpiṇī iti āha ã yugārdham /
GS41aryabhcu:6072: yasmāt ekasmin maṇḍale grahasya grahaiḥ saha yogaḥ sambhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:6079: tasya yugasya madhye antare iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6080: suṣamā āditaḥ antataḥ ca gaṇyamāne suṣamā,
GS41aryabhcu:6081: ekasya padasya āditaḥ aparasya antataḥ iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6084: katham etāḥ punar utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣamāgrahabhuktayaḥ vijñāyante iti atra āha ã indūccāt,
GS41aryabhcu:6086: tat yathā ã indoḥ kendrasya yadā rāśitrayam dvau bhāgau aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ ca kalāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6089: tataḥ tasmāt rāśiṣaṭkāt kendrāt upacitānām bhuktīnām utkrameṇa apacayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6090: yāvat kendrasya aṣṭau rāśayaḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ bhāgāḥ dvātriṃśat liptāḥ ca saṃjātāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6091: / etāḥ eva utkrameṇa dvitīyapadāntāt pravigaṇyamānāḥ tulyāḥ iti ādau ante ca suṣamā /
GS41aryabhcu:6093: dvitīyapadanirdiṣṭakendrāt prabhṛti krameṇa yāḥ bhuktayaḥ yāḥ ca tṛtīyapadanirdiṣṭakendrāt utkrameṇa bhuktayaḥ tāḥ tulyāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6097: atra indukendram uddiśya ācāryeṇa utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣamāḥ pradarśitāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6098: etat vidhānam anyeṣām api grahāṇām pratipattavyam /
GS41aryabhcu:6099: tat yathā ã sūryasya yadā kendram rāśitrayam sacatuṣpañcāśalliptam,
GS41aryabhcu:6102: yadā ca aṣṭau rāśayaḥ ekonatriṃśadbhāgāḥ liptāḥ ca ṣaṭ gatāḥ [tadā api] vyāsārdhatulyaḥ [karṇaḥ] ,
GS41aryabhcu:6109: ṣaṣṭyabdānām ṣaṣṭiḥ yadā vyatītāḥ trayaḥ ca yugapādāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6110: tryadhikā viṃśatiḥ abdāḥ tadā iha mama janmanaḥ atītāḥ // 10 //
GS41aryabhcu:6124: etat eva ācāryāryabhaṭaḥ śāstravyākhyānasamaye vā pāṇḍuraṅgasvāmi-lāṭadeva-niśaṅku-prabhṛtibhyaḥ provāca /
GS41aryabhcu:6125: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã asya vyākhyānam kim upakaroti iti?
GS41aryabhcu:6126: ucyate ã anena atītena kālena parijñātena sukham ādityādīnām kālaḥ atītaḥ anāgataḥ vā paṭhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6127: atha ca sampradāyāvicchedāt vyatītaḥ kālaḥ vijñāyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6132: ekasya abhidhāne etāvataḥ tāvat sampradāyāvicchedāt araḥ na kartavyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6133: kintu ācāryajanmakālāvadheḥ yaḥ uttaraḥ kālaḥ asya eva sampradāyāvicchedaḥ adhigantavyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6134: anyat ca “ṣaṣṭyabdānām ṣaṣṭiḥ” iti asya abhidhāne prayojanam abhidhāsyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6135: ayam asya abhiprāyaḥ ã kṛtayugādeḥ ahargaṇaḥ sādhyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6137: kṛtayugādeḥ punar ahargaṇe kriyamāṇe śaśyuccapātayoḥ na eva kṣepaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6146: athavā karaṇāgatam eva tamaḥ yathā iṣṭasphuṭacandramasi prakṣipya dakṣiṇottaradigvidheḥ vikṣepānayanam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6147: atha ahargaṇe dṛṣṭe grahagatyānayanam ã yadi yugāhargaṇena grahāṇām gītikābhihitabhagaṇāḥ labhyante anena ahargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6150: atha atra romakāḥ pratyabdaśodhanena ādityam ānayanti /
GS41aryabhcu:6151: tena ca ādityena sarvān eva grahān iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6153: tat yathā ã pratyabdaśodhanam hi nāma caitraśuklapratipadi ardhodayāt ārabhya yāvat ādityaudayikasya maṇḍalagantavyasya bhogakālaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6154: sa yugānte yugaravibhagaṇaiḥ pramāṇecchābhūtaiḥ divasasaṅkhyāḥ eva bhavanti /
GS41aryabhcu:6156: tat yathā ã “yadi yugaravibhagaṇaiḥ bhūdivasasaṅkhyaḥ ahargaṇaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6157: labhyate iṣṭaravibhagaṇaiḥ kiyān iti ahargaṇaḥ labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6158: śeṣe ṣaṣṭyādiguṇite ghaṭikādayaḥ iti ravibhagaṇasamāptikālāvadheḥ ahargaṇaḥ labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6161: athavā varṣāntikena ahargaṇena trairāśikam ã yadi caturyugāhargaṇena khughṛ-tulyāḥ sūryabhagaṇāḥ labhyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6162: anena kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti labdham bhagaṇāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6163: śeṣāt gatagantavyam kṛtvā gatagantavyarāśeḥ yugasūryabhagaṇaiḥ bhāgalabdham divasāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6165: caitraśuklādeḥ upariṣṭāt adhaḥ vā ravibhagaṇasamāptikālāvadhayaḥ divasādayaḥ bhavanti /
GS41aryabhcu:6166: etat eva pratyabdaśodhanam asmābhiḥ karmanibandhe laghutaram
GS41aryabhcu:6171: māsāḥ bhavanti divasāḥ ca hṛte avaśiṣṭāḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:6180: ravijadivasayojyāḥ ca avamāḥ ye atra labdhāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6183: yadi tat adhikaśuddham kṣepyam eva upadiṣṭam // iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6185: evam pratyabdaśodhanam ānīya tataḥ arkaḥ sādhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6186: katham? etat api tatra uktam eva ã
GS41aryabhcu:6189: tataḥ idam api śodhyam śodhanīyam samāyām
GS41aryabhcu:6191: saptatyā divasādyāḥ śarabhāgāḥ dviguṇitāḥ vighaṭikāḥ ca /
GS41aryabhcu:6192: tadrahitaḥ grahadehaḥ ravibudhabhṛgavaḥ ca nirdiṣṭāḥ // iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6202: tadā ekena ravidivasena kiyantaḥ iti trairāśikanyāyena [labdham bhagaṇātmikā grahagatiḥ] /
GS41aryabhcu:6208: labhyante grahāṇām sūryadivasabhuktayaḥ ataḥ ca yathālabdhāḥ likhyante ã candramasaḥ liptāḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ liptātrisahasrabhāgāḥ navavasurāmāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6216: sūryabhuktaliptābhiḥ ca trairāśikena yat avāptam phalam prakṣipya khakhaṣaḍghanena vibhajet,
GS41aryabhcu:6218: iyān tatra viśeṣaḥ candramasi trayodaśaguṇaḥ sūryaḥ kṣepaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6221: etat api aśeṣagrahānayanam karma laghutaram eva karmanibandhe pradarśitam
GS41aryabhcu:6226: kālaḥ ayam anādyantaḥ grahabhaiḥ anumīyate kṣetre // 11 //
GS41aryabhcu:6227: yugam ca varṣam ca māsaḥ ca divasaḥ ca yugavarṣamāsadivasāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6228: ete samam pravṛttāḥ yugapat pravṛttāḥ iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6234: tasmāt caitraśuklādeḥ yugādayaḥ ye te yugapat pravṛttāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6235: nanu ca yuge caitraśuklādeḥ pravṛtte sarve eva samam pravṛttāḥ syuḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6236: tasmāt yugam caitraśuklādeḥ pravṛttam iti etat eva astu /
GS41aryabhcu:6239: prathame vāsavasya aṃśe dvitīyāṃśe tu ajasya tu /
GS41aryabhcu:6241: saumyasya prathamāṃśe ca dvitīyāṃśe punar vasoḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6242: sārpasya aṃśe tṛtīye tu caturthāṃśe bhagasya ca //
GS41aryabhcu:6243: tvāṣṭrasya ādyāṃśake ca eva dvitīyāṃśe viśākhayoḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6244: aindrasya aṃśe tṛtīye ca āpyasya aṃśe caturthake //
GS41aryabhcu:6245: yadā samānām adhipaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ataḥ utthitaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6246: udayati aṃśakānte vā prathamaḥ paryayaḥ bhavet // iti/
GS41aryabhcu:6248: tasyām ca varṣapravṛttau bhinnāyām māsadivasapravṛttī api bhinne eva bhavataḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6249: athavā evam syāt ã iyam varṣāṇām pravṛttiḥ nānāprakārā phalārthibhiḥ saṃhitākāraiḥ upadiṣṭā /
GS41aryabhcu:6252: tasmāt yā paratantreṣu loke ca prasiddhā pravṛttiḥ tasyāḥ grahaṇam bhaviṣyati iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6254: tat yathā ã surāṣṭrāsu kārtikaśuklapratipadaḥ pravṛttiḥ varṣamāsadivasānām,
GS41aryabhcu:6256: nivṛttiḥ / tathā ca magadhāsu āṣāḍhe kṛṣṇapratipadaḥ samāmāsadivasānām pravṛttiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6258: tathā ca arthaśāstre api abhihitam ã “triśatam sacatuṣpañcāśatam ahorātrāṇām karma sāṃvatsaraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6259: tam āṣāḍhīparyavasānam ūnam pūrṇam vā dadyāt” iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6264: yugādīnām caitraśuklādeḥ pravṛttyabhidhānam siddham eva etat /
GS41aryabhcu:6265: idānām praṣṭavyam ã siṃharājena na śuklāntaḥ māsaḥ svatantre pratipāditaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6266: tathā ca loke śuklāntaḥ eva prasiddhaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6270: atra ucyate ã yat tu siṃharājena abhihitam tat svābhiprāyeṇa adhikamāsakāvamānām
GS41aryabhcu:6271: yugapat pravṛttatvāt āṣāḍhapaurṇamāsī [taḥ ārabhya caturdaśī] paryantāvasānam saṃvatsaraḥ iti parikalpitaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6272: yadi api ucyate “śuklāntaḥ māsaḥ loke prasiddhaḥ” iti, tat na /
GS41aryabhcu:6277: iti, asya api anyaḥ eva arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6281: kṛttikāsu yuktaḥ candramā asmin sati kārtikaḥ māsaḥ iti ādi /
GS41aryabhcu:6282: anyat ca ã śuklāntena māsena na kadācit api mīnameṣasandhau māsasya varṣasya vā ante grahāḥ syuḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6284: māse tu śuklapratipatpravṛtte pūrve śaśī mandabalaḥ daśāhe /
GS41aryabhcu:6286: yadā punar śuklādiḥ māsaḥ tadā punar śrutyarthaḥ anuṣṭhitaḥ bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:6288: eṣā hi vai saṃvatsarasya prathamā rātriḥ yat phālgunī paurṇamāsī yā uttarā /
GS41aryabhcu:6290: tadā katham iyam uttarā paurṇamāsī phālgunī bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:6296: tataḥ manyāmahe na adya api phālgunaḥ māsaḥ samāpyate iti / yasmāt āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6300: [ yā asau] vaiśākhasya amāvāsyā tasyām agnim ādadhīta,
GS41aryabhcu:6304: yadi śuklāntaḥ māsaḥ parikalpyate tadā na vaiśākhasya amāvāsyāyām rohiṇyā candramasaḥ yogaḥ vidyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6307: tataḥ ca svātyādiṣu nakṣatreṣu pratipat [prabhṛti] gaṇyamānā amāvāsyā bharaṇyā yujyate, na rohiṇyā /
GS41aryabhcu:6313: tataḥ kṛṣṇapakṣapratipatprabhṛtyanurādhādiṣu gaṇyamānāsu rohiṇyā amāvāsyāyāḥ ca yogaḥ saṃbhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:6320: aparapakṣe śrāddham kurvīta ūrdhvam vā caturthyāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6323: aparatvāt śuklapakṣasya śuklapakṣe eva śrāddhavidhiḥ prāpnoti na kṛṣṇe,
GS41aryabhcu:6326: tataḥ “yugavarṣamāsadivasāḥ samam pravṛttāḥ tu caitraśuklādeḥ” iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6328: yugādīnām caitra[śuklāditaḥ pravṛtti]tvāt kālasya ādimattāprasaṅgaḥ iti āha ã kālaḥ ayam anādyantaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6331: na asya antaḥ na asya ādiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6333: yadi kālasya ādiḥ syāt tataḥ kim syāt?
GS41aryabhcu:6337: katham punar asya ādiḥ vyavahārārtham parikalpitaḥ iti āha ã grahabhaiḥ anumīyate kṣetre /
GS41aryabhcu:6339: taiḥ grahabhaiḥ anumīyate ādiḥ antaḥ ca /
GS41aryabhcu:6340: “māṅ māne” [pāṇinīyadhātupāṭhaḥ 1143] iti ayam dhātuḥ dhūmāt agnyanumānam iti atra māne vartate /
GS41aryabhcu:6341: atra punar grahabhaiḥ anumīyate iti mānārthaḥ eva /
GS41aryabhcu:6346: mīnameṣasandhau kṣitisaṃyuktāḥ tadā yugasya ādiḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6350: mukhyasya yogasya asaṃbhavāt gauṇaḥ yogaḥ parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6351: yatra bhūlagnaḥ iva grahaḥ lakṣyate sa bhūgrahayoḥ yogaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6352: sa ca udayāstamayayoḥ saṃbhavati iti udayāstamayayoḥ vā parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6353: anye punar anyathā vyāvarṇayanti ã grahabhaiḥ anumīyate iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6354: grahaiḥ ca nakṣatraiḥ ca kālasya ādiḥ antaḥ ca parikalpyate / tat yathā ã
GS41aryabhcu:6356: tasmāt saṃvatsaraḥ māsāt bārhaspatyaḥ pragaṇyatām // iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6358: loke ca evam vaktāraḥ bhavanti ã “svātau udite prasthāsyāmahe udayaḥ ” iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6369: ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdānām ādityavarṣāṇām ṣaṣṭyā grahāḥ nakṣatrakakṣyām prapūrayanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6370: nakṣatrakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni svāsu svāsu kakṣyāsu gacchanti iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6371: [kiyadyojanāni] punar nakṣatrakakṣyāyām grahāḥ sūryābdānām ṣaṣṭyā pūrayanti?
GS41aryabhcu:6374: kim tarhi? kā eṣā pratipāditā iti?
GS41aryabhcu:6377: punar etena eva nakṣatrakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni gacchanti iti ucyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6378: yadi khyughṛ-tulyaiḥ arkavarṣaiḥ svān-svān bhagaṇān grahāḥ bhuñjante [tadā] ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6380: punar ṣaṣṭibhāgena ete[ṣām] khyughṛ-tulyānām arkavarṣāṇām dvāsaptatisahasrāṇi /
GS41aryabhcu:6382: tataḥ punar api ã yadi ekena bhagaṇena pratisvakakṣyā labhyate [tadā] ṣaṣṭyabdabhogena kā iti sarvagrahebhyaḥ nakṣatrakakṣyā
GS41aryabhcu:6388: yasmāt divi sañcaratām grahāṇām ekatra yogaḥ bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:6389: ataḥ [divyam yugam uktam tena] divyena nabhaḥparidhim /
GS41aryabhcu:6393: nanu ca viyat aparimitayojanapramāṇam iti śrūyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6402: yāvanti yojanāni svakakṣyāyām śaśī saṃcarati tāvanti eva yojanāni ārkiḥ api svakakṣyāyām sañcarati /
GS41aryabhcu:6403: tat yathā ã yadi ekena bhagaṇena svakakṣyā labhyate [tadā] yugabhagaṇaiḥ kim iti khakakṣyā labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6404: athavā ã ṣaṣṭyabdabhogena nakṣatrakakṣyā labhyate svaiḥ yugabhagaṇaiḥ kim iti khakakṣyā labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6407: [yuga]bhūdinaiḥ sarve eva svāsu kakṣyāsu samagatyā bhramantaḥ [kha]kakṣyātulyāni yojanāni prayānti,
GS41aryabhcu:6408: ekena ahnā kiyanti iti sarvagrahāṇām yojanagatā dinabhuktiḥ labhyate iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6409: khakakṣyāyām bhūdinaiḥ bhāge hṛte yojanagatā grahāṇām dinabhuktiḥ labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6410: tayā trairāśikam bhaṅktvā madhyamagrahāḥ ānīyante ã yadi svakakṣyāyojanaiḥ bhagaṇaḥ labhyate tadā gatiyojanaiḥ kim iti āhnikī bhuktiḥ labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6411: tataḥ punar api ã yadi ekena ahnā bhuktiḥ labhyate ahargaṇena
GS41aryabhcu:6412: kim iti / atra ekaḥ pūrvatrairāśike guṇakāraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6414: ] ataḥ guṇakārabhāgahārayoḥ tulyatvāt naṣṭayoḥ ahargaṇasya dina[gati]yojanāni guṇakāraḥ sthitaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6417: ambarakakṣyā bhūdinahṛtā phalam tatra yojanāni teṣu /
GS41aryabhcu:6419: iti / a[thavā khakakṣyā]hargaṇasaṃvarge svakakṣyābhūdinasaṃvargahṛte bhagaṇādayaḥ bhavanti // 12 //
GS41aryabhcu:6422: maṇḍalam alpam adhastāt kālena alpena pūrayati candraḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6423: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām mahat ca mahatā śanaiḥ cārī // 13 //
GS41aryabhcu:6425: sarveṣām adhaḥ vyavasthitam maṇḍalam alpam alpe[na kālena pūraya]ti candramāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6426: adhastāt iti anena eva maṇḍalasya alpatvasiddhiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6428: katham adhastāt iti etāvati ucyamāne maṇḍalasya alpatvam gamyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6429: ucyate ã upari upari kakṣyāḥ vyavasthitāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6430: tāsām upari upari vyavasthitānām adhaḥ yā vyavasthitā sā sarvatanīyasī /
GS41aryabhcu:6434: 15] iti atra kakṣyāṇām upari upari vyavasthitim vakṣyati /
GS41aryabhcu:6435: nanu ca anye bruvate ã sarveṣām upari candramasaḥ kakṣyā iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6437: ] sarveṣām grahāṇām adhaḥ candrakakṣyā iti āha /
GS41aryabhcu:6438: yadi upari syāt tadā candrasya grahanakṣatrabhede sphuṭakalaṅkahariṇe grahanakṣatra[tārāḥ dṛśyeran] /
GS41aryabhcu:6439: sūryavaśāt yadi upari candraḥ syāt tadā sūryeṇa ārāt vyavasthitena sadā candramasoḥ api svasya ārāt bhāgam akhaṇḍam dṛśyeta,
GS41aryabhcu:6443: anye punar sugata[matā]valambinaḥ sūryācandramasoḥ ekām kakṣyām ācakṣate ã
GS41aryabhcu:6445: ardharātraḥ astagamanam madhyāhnaḥ udayaḥ sakṛt // iti //
GS41aryabhcu:6448: ekapañcāśat [yojanāni] sūryaḥ tadā kim iti sūryaḥ [na] mahān upalabhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6450: atha vidūratvāt arkaḥ na mahān upalakṣyate iti cet na /
GS41aryabhcu:6452: anyat ca tulyakakṣyāvyavasthitatvāt sūryācandramasoḥ sūryagrahaṇam na eva syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:6453: na ca candramasam muktvā anyaḥ rāhuḥ asti yena savitā chādyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6455: syāt tathā api mahattvāt sūryabimbasya na eva arkaḥ sakalaḥ chādyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6456: na eva arkaḥ candreṇa chādyate iti cet tat api uttaratra vyākhyāsyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6459: kim? tat alpam maṇḍalam adhaḥ vyavasthitam /
GS41aryabhcu:6460: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām maṇḍalānām mahat maṇḍalam mahatā kālena śanaiḥ caraḥ pūrayati /
GS41aryabhcu:6463: tat yathā ã candramāḥ divasasaṅkhyayā saptaviṃśatyā sārdhaikayā maṇḍalam gacchati,
GS41aryabhcu:6467: guruḥ] tu varṣaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ kiñcit ūnaiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6468: śanaiścaraḥ tu triṃśatā varṣaiḥ kiñcit ūnaiḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6469: evam ete bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ grahāḥ vyākhyātāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6470: atha yadi tulyakakṣyāsthāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ eva syuḥ tadā eteṣām yugādeḥ saṃpravṛttānām na kadācit viyogaḥ syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:6471: atha [yadi] yojanagatena ete bhinnagatayaḥ syuḥ tadā eteṣām bhuktiliptānayane yojanaiḥ yathāsvam prasiddhabhuktiliptāḥ na āgaccheyuḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6472: tasmāt bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ api grahāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ eva iti // 13 //
GS41aryabhcu:6474: kakṣyāṇām alpamahattvāt rāśibhāgaliptāḥ bahvyaḥ alpāḥ iti sandehaḥ tannivṛttyartham āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6475: alpe hi maṇḍale alpāḥ mahati mahāntaḥ ca rāśayaḥ jñeyāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6476: aṃśāḥ kalāḥ tathā evam vibhāgatulyāḥ svakakṣyāsu // 14 //
GS41aryabhcu:6477: alpe maṇḍale alpāḥ rāśayaḥ mahati maṇḍale mahāntaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6480: tat yathā ã alpe mahati ca maṇḍale maṇḍaladvādaśabhāgaḥ rāśiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6485: kakṣyāṇām upari adhaḥ ava[sthiti]kramaparijñānāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6487: eṣām adhaḥ ca bhūmiḥ medhībhūtā khamadhyasthā // 15 //
GS41aryabhcu:6496: atra “bhūta“-śabdaḥ bahuṣu artheṣu vartamānaḥ iva arthe pratipattavyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6505: yadā ataḥ anyeṣu grahanakṣatrāṇi smararipusutahibukasahajadhaneṣu vartante tadā katham adhaḥ bhūḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6513: tadvat hi sarvasattvaiḥ jalajaiḥ sthalajaiḥ ca bhūgolaḥ // iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6517: tat yathā ã yā]vat alpamaṇḍalam bhāni bhramanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6518: tāvat mahānti maṇḍalāni śanaiścarādayaḥ [na] śaknuvanti pūrayitum iti pṛṣṭhataḥ lakṣyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6520: atra parihāraḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ ã yadi upari syāt tadā candrasya grahanakṣatrabhede sphuṭakalaṅkahariṇe grahanakṣatratārāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6524: ataḥ drutagatibhiḥ nakṣatraiḥ īṣamandagatiḥ īṣat jīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6528: atra api yadi prāṅmukhāḥ grahādayaḥ tadā prāṅmukhaiḥ drutagatibhiḥ nakṣatraiḥ jīyamānaḥ aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ revatyām upalakṣyeta,
GS41aryabhcu:6530: api ca, pratilomagatitvāt aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ bharaṇyām eva upalakṣyeta /
GS41aryabhcu:6532: tathā api vakrakāle aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ pratilomagatitvāt bharaṇyām upalakṣyeta /
GS41aryabhcu:6534: anyat ca ã anyonyabimbacchādanam na syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:6535: grahoparāgaḥ api ca tulyakakṣyāvyavasthitatvāt na yujyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6536: tasmāt “bhānām adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ” iti ādi suṣṭhu uktam // 15 //
GS41aryabhcu:6539: sapta ete horeśāḥ śanaiścarādyāḥ yathākramam śīghrāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6541: ete grahāḥ śanaiścarādayaḥ tulyagatayaḥ api santaḥ yathākrameṇa śīghrāḥ lakṣyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6544: tat yathā ã śanaiścarasya kālahorāyām nivṛttāyām bṛhaspateḥ kālahorā,
GS41aryabhcu:6547: evam sūryodayāt prabhṛti yāvat sūryasya ardhāstamayaḥ iti dvādaśa kālahorāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6548: tataḥ ca ardhāstamayāt ardhodayaḥ iti punar dvādaśa /
GS41aryabhcu:6552: sā ca divase divase divasādhipātaḥ prabhṛti pratipattavyā /
GS41aryabhcu:6555: horeśvarāḥ taddivasādhipādikrameṇa tāḥ tatra caturguṇāḥ ṣaṭ //
GS41aryabhcu:6556: evam divasādhipāt sūryodayāt gaṇyamānāt uttaradivasasya adhipāt eva ardhodayāt śīghrakramāt caturthaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6557: yaḥ śīghrakramaḥ abhihitaḥ “bhānām adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ” iti ādi tasmāt caturthaḥ divasādhipatiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6558: tat yathā ã śanaiścarāt caturthaḥ sūryaḥ divasādhipatiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6561: evam anena krameṇa māsādhipāḥ abdādhipāḥ ca avagantavyāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6562: katham? [māsasya varṣasya ca yaḥ] prathamadivase adhipaḥ sa māsādhipaḥ varṣādhipaḥ ca
GS41aryabhcu:6565: yadi api śeṣeṇa uktaḥ sūryodayaśeṣeṇa ardhodayaḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6566: kutaḥ? idam bimbāvayavābhidhāne api tadavayavapramāṇasya mānakālāvadhāraṇāśakyatvāt ardhodayasya ca vyaktalakṣaṇatvāt suparicchedanayā ardhodayaḥ āśriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6567: athavā anirdiṣṭeṣu vastuṣu madhyamapratipatteḥ ardhodayāt ārabhya punar ardhodayaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6575: yadā protpannaḥ sahasrakiraṇaḥ tadā prabhṛti vārādivyavahāraḥ sañjātaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6576: ataḥ suṣṭhu uktam sūryodayāt dinapāḥ iti // 16 //
GS41aryabhcu:6578: ete grahāḥ kasmin maṇḍale bhramanti iti [na jñāyate] ataḥ tannirūpaṇāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6580: mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghhroccāt // 17 //
GS41aryabhcu:6583: athavā kakṣyā ca pratimaṇḍalam ca kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale,
GS41aryabhcu:6587: athavā kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalayoḥ yatra sampātaḥ sa kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalaśabdena ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6591: ucyate ã kakṣyā ca pratimaṇḍalam ca kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale /
GS41aryabhcu:6594: katham? iṣṭatvāt śeṣavigrahārthavācakatvāt ca atra iṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6603: na evam vijñāyate madhyamaḥ grahaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6607: tat yathā ã kaścit sāṃvatsaram pṛcchati ã “kaḥ savitā” iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6609: ekaḥ pañcadaśa bhāgāḥ triṃśat liptāḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6610: tatra yaḥ paripṛcchati yaḥ ca ācaṣṭe tayoḥ ubhayoḥ abhi[prāya]dvayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6612: yā madhyamā gatiḥ sā sphuṭagatisādhanasya upāyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6613: anyathā aniyatatvāt sphuṭagatiḥ aśakyā syāt vijñātum /
GS41aryabhcu:6615: yat asya grahasya vyāsārdhatulyam bhūtārāgrahavivaram sa tasmāt pradeśāt prabhṛti kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya upari adhaḥ vā avatiṣṭhate /
GS41aryabhcu:6617: ucyate ã yadā tṛtīye karmaṇi dvitīye pade mandoccakendram rāśitrayam dvau bhāgau pañcāśat liptāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6619: caturthe karmaṇi yadā śīghroccakendram rāśitrayam pañcabhāgāḥ viṃśatiḥ ca kalā,
GS41aryabhcu:6622: asmāt pradeśāt prabhṛti bhūtārāgrahavivaram pratidinam apacīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6625: bhramanti sarve grahāḥ svacāreṇa iti etat nigadavyākhyānam eva /
GS41aryabhcu:6628: tena mandoccāt hetoḥ anulomam iti vyākhyāyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6634: ucyate ã yadā śīghroccakendram dvitīyapade tadā sarve grahāḥ vakriṇaḥ bhavanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6638: bhavet vakrātivakrā ca tathā anukuṭilā gatiḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:6640: ucyate ã yadā adyatanāt grahāt śvastanaḥ grahaḥ tulyaḥ bhavati tadā vakraprārambhaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6641: athavā hyastanāt grahāt adyatanaḥ grahaḥ tulyaḥ tadā api vakraprārambhaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6642: yadā adyatanāt tṛtīyapade śvastanaḥ grahaḥ adhikaḥ tadā vakrasya nivṛttiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6643: athavā hyastanāt grahāt adyatanaḥ grahaḥ adhikaḥ tṛtīyapade tadā api vakrasya nivṛttiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6644: yadā grahaḥ bahvīḥ liptāḥ nivartate tadā ativakragatiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6645: katham punar idam vidhānam śīghroccāt eva gaṇakaḥ prajānate,
GS41aryabhcu:6647: ucyate ã yasmāt sūryavaśāt grahāṇām udayāstamayavakrānuvakrāḥ gatayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6648: yadi evam atra katham budhaśukrayoḥ anyat śīghroccam,
GS41aryabhcu:6650: atra api sūryavaśāt eva tayoḥ udayāstamayaparijñānam /
GS41aryabhcu:6652: athavā uccanīcamadhyamaparidhiḥ iti evamādisphuṭagatisādhanopāya[bhūtānām ca] upāyānām na [eva niyamo]ktiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6653: vā vidyate / kevalam tu upeyasādhakāḥ upāyāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6657: tathā hi bhiṣajaḥ hi utpalanālādiṣu vadhādīni abhyasyante /
GS41aryabhcu:6663: tasmāt upāyeṣu asatyeṣu satyapratipādanapareṣu na codyam asti /
GS41aryabhcu:6664: atha kim artham ime grahāḥ pratidinam bhrāmyanti /
GS41aryabhcu:6665: atha ca loke kaścit bhraman kāraṇena bhramati /
GS41aryabhcu:6666: anyat ca ã na evaṃvidhaḥ kaścit dṛśyate anavaratagatiḥ yathā ime tārāgrahāḥ bhramanti iti dṛṣṭāntatvena udāharaṇabhūtaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6667: ucyate ã sarvādau kila bhagavān prajāpatiḥ grahān uktavān yat “bhavantaḥ meṣādigaṇeṣu prajānām śubhāśubhaphalāya bhrāmyata” iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6678: śrūyante ca śabdāḥ ye ca apare atra gativācakāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6681: 5.1.76] iti anena nityam panthānam gacchati iti asmin arthe pānthaḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6682: atra loke na kaścit adhvānam anavaratam gacchan dṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6684: na ca ayam śabdaḥ asatsvārtheṣu śaśaviṣāṇakūrmaromavandhyāputraśabdavat pravṛttaḥ / tasmāt
GS41aryabhcu:6685: suṣṭhu ucyate śabdena arthānumānam pānthāḥ grahāḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6687: mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghroccāt /
GS41aryabhcu:6688: mandoccāt yataḥ mandoccakendrāt pratimaṇḍalavidhānena ānītam phalam pratyaham upacīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6692: yasmāt pratimaṇḍalavidhānena ānītam phalam sarvadā apacīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6698: kakṣyāmaṇḍalatulyam svam svam pratimaṇḍalam bhavati eṣām /
GS41aryabhcu:6704: svam svam pratimaṇḍalam ātmīyam ātmīyam pratimaṇḍalam, bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:6707: yat madhyam kendram tat ghanabhūmadhyāt atikrāntam /
GS41aryabhcu:6708: ghanāḥ ca asau bhūḥ ca ghanabhūḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6712: tat yathā ã yāvat pramāṇaparikalpitam ṣaṣṭiśatatrayāṃśāvacchinnam kakṣyāmaṇḍalam pūrvāparam ūrdhvam vinyasya,
GS41aryabhcu:6713: tādṛś eva anyat maṇḍalam upari adhaḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt vakṣyamāṇena antareṇa pūrvāparayoḥ diśoḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra yat badhyate gole tatpratimaṇḍalam nāma /
GS41aryabhcu:6718: vṛttaparidhau grahāḥ te madhyamacārāt bhramanti evam // 19 //
GS41aryabhcu:6724: tat yathā ã “jhārdhāni mandavṛttam” iti adhikṛtya “śaśinaḥ cha” [gītikāí,
GS41aryabhcu:6729: 10] iti evamādeḥ paridheḥ ayutatulyam vyāsārdham labhyate tadā sārdhaikatriṃśadbhāgapramāṇasya paridheḥ kim iti labdham bhāgāḥ pañca,
GS41aryabhcu:6733: tasya ca trairāśikena svavṛttaviṣkambhārdham labdham bhāgadvayam,
GS41aryabhcu:6736: vyāsārdham labhyate tadā uccanīcaparidheḥ kim iti labdham candrasya uccanīcavyāsārdham liptātriśatī sārdhādhikarūpā /
GS41aryabhcu:6738: tatra bhāgapramāṇena liptāpramāṇena vā kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalamadhyāntaram parikalpyam /
GS41aryabhcu:6740: anyathā anyeṣām samaviṣamavṛttamandoccaśīghroccabhedena anekapratimaṇḍalaprasaṅgabhayāt uttaratra vakṣyati ã “bhūtārāgrahavivaram” [kālakriyāí, 25] iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6744: pratimaṇḍaleṣu sphuṭacāram bhramanti iti arthāt avasīyate // 19 //
GS41aryabhcu:6748: anulomagatiḥ vṛtte mandagatiḥ yaḥ grahaḥ bhavati // 20 //
GS41aryabhcu:6750: śīghragatiḥ ca tat svoccam ca śīghragatiḥ svoccam,
GS41aryabhcu:6754: tadā sā eva sphuṭamadhyamā bhuktiḥ svakendrāntajyāsādhitā svaśīghroccabhukteḥ pratilome[na] pātyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6759: pratilomā gatiḥ yasya saḥ pratilomagatiḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6760: āditaḥ eva etat bhuktyānayanam prati vakṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6761: tat yathā ã mandoccakendrāntajyām krameṇa utkrameṇa vā niṣpannām svamadhyamabhuktiliptābhiḥ guṇayet /
GS41aryabhcu:6762: punar ca tat kālapratidhinā guṇitasya aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ bhāgalabdham kendrapadavaśāt
GS41aryabhcu:6763: ardhīkṛtya grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu prakṣipya viśodhya vā svaśīghroccabhuktiliptābhiḥ śodhayet /
GS41aryabhcu:6769: tataḥ tam kṣiptaviśodhitaśeṣam gṛhītvā tṛtīyakarma ã mandoccakendrāntajyākramotkramajyām tat kālaparidhiguṇam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vibhajet
GS41aryabhcu:6770: labdham samastam eva grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu mandakendrapadavaśāt kṣipet,
GS41aryabhcu:6774: śeṣam [gṛhītvā] caturthakarma ã śīghroccakendrānta[jyākramotkrama]jyām tat kālaparidhiguṇam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vibhajet /
GS41aryabhcu:6776: tatra yad avāptam tat yadi kṣepyam sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu kṣipet,
GS41aryabhcu:6778: atha viśodhyam sad yadi sphuṭamadhyamabhuktitaḥ na patati tadā pratilomagatiḥ grahaḥ sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāḥ eva viparītam
GS41aryabhcu:6785: yadā śīghroccāt śīghroccakendrāntajyāniṣpannā liptāḥ sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptābhyaḥ viśuddhāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6788: tataḥ arthāt ayam vigrahaḥ avasitaḥ ã anulomā gatiḥ yasya sa anulomagatiḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6789: sa ca alpam gaccahati iti mandagatiḥ abhidhīyate // 20 //
GS41aryabhcu:6797: tat atra api śīghroccāvadheḥ madhyamāt iti etat ekaprakrameṇa bhavitavyam /
GS41aryabhcu:6798: na iti āha ã śīghrā[t pratilomaga]tiḥ pratilomāvadheḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6799: śīghroccasya pratilomagatīni viparītagatīni yāni vṛttāni paridhayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6800: atra vṛttasya ekadeśe vṛttaśabdopa[cārāt paridhayaḥ ca] iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6802: ataḥ tāni dhanūṃṣi mandakendrāt jātāni krameṇa
GS41aryabhcu:6806: katham punar vṛttāni mandaśīghrakendrayoḥ tajjyādhanūṃṣi kramotkrama[gatīni?
GS41aryabhcu:6808: gatiḥ asti iti bhūtānām sukumārāyate manaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6809: [anastvaniśam eva ūḍham dhuram] vahati gauḥ iva //
GS41aryabhcu:6811: dānam bhogaḥ nāśaḥ tisraḥ gatayaḥ bhavanti vittasya /
GS41aryabhcu:6812: yaḥ na dadāti na bhuṅkte tasya tṛtīyā gatiḥ bhavati //
GS41aryabhcu:6815: tasmāt yāni eva jyādhanūṃṣi tāni eva pratilomānulomagatīni /
GS41aryabhcu:6816: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã mandoccajyādhanūṃṣi mandoccāt upacīyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6826: ayam āryāsūtrārthaḥ yathā ghaṭate tathā karmaṇā pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6828: śeṣam rāśyādikam mandoccāt pravṛttam tat kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannam iti pratimaṇḍale kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6830: tena tasmāt mandoccāt ārabhya yat kāṣṭham tat mahati maṇḍale alpam bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:6833: alpe pratimaṇḍale tat eva kāṣṭham bahutaram
GS41aryabhcu:6835: vrīhyādayaḥ mahatā mānaviśeṣeṇa pramīyamānāḥ prasthādisaṅkhyayā alpāḥ bhavanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6836: [te] eva alpena mānaviśeṣeṇa mīyamānāḥ prasthādiśaṅkhyayā bahavaḥ bhavanti evam atra api /
GS41aryabhcu:6837: katham punar tat kāṣṭham kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannam pratimaṇḍale pramīyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6838: ucyate ã tat kāṣṭhasya padāni vyatītāni pratyākalayya vartamānapadasya bhujākoṭijyayā karma idam kriyate ã “pratimaṇḍalasya madhyam ghanabhūmadhyāt atikrāntam” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:6839: 18] iti pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram koṭyām prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6841: etat pratipādanārtham samāyāmavanau vṛttakendram nidhāya yāvat tāvat pramāṇaparikalpitavyāsārdhapramāṇena karkaṭakena vṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:6843: [sūtram mandoccābhimukham] dakṣiṇena nidhāya tatra kakṣyāmaṇḍalavyāsārdhatulyakarkaṭakena vṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:6847: adhaḥ / tatra yā koṭijyā sā kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannā kakṣyāmaṇḍalabhūmyantarālapramāṇā /
GS41aryabhcu:6848: tena pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarāntarālamātreṇa pratimaṇḍalam prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ koṭiḥ na prāpnoti iti prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6849: dvitīyatṛtīyapadayoḥ tāvatā atītāt pratimaṇḍalāt koṭiḥ iti apanīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6851: atha yadi koṭi[jyātaḥ] pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram na śudhyati,
GS41aryabhcu:6854: / tatra evam niṣpannāyāḥ koṭeḥ bhujajyāyāḥ ca vargasamāsamūlam karṇaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6857: tat yadi vyāsārdhatulyena pratimaṇḍalakarṇena yathā uktam pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram labhyate tadā tena pratimaṇḍalakarṇena kim iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6860: tena punar pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarānayanam iti yāvat aviśeṣaḥ / tataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6861: aviśiṣṭakarṇena vyastatrairāśikam kriyate ã yadi vyāsārdhaviṣkambhasya kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya iyam bhujajyā labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6862: tadā tena karṇena pratimaṇḍalajena kā iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6866: tat kāṣṭham mandocce prakṣipya sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:6868: dvitīyapade ṣaḍbhyaḥ rāśibhyaḥ viśodhya bhujā gṛhītā iti ṣaṅbhyaḥ apanīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6870: tṛtīyapade cakrārdhādhikabhujā iti tat cāpam cakrārdhasahitam mandocce prakṣipyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6871: caturthapade dvādaśebhyaḥ viśuddhaśeṣam bhujā iti cakrāt tat kāṣṭham viśodhya śeṣam mandocce prakṣipyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6874: yeṣām punar śīghroccam vidyate teṣām karmaviśeṣaḥ ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6875: tat yathā ã paridhicālanāprayogeṇa sphuṭīkṛtaparidhinā vyāsārdham samguṇayya aśītyā bhāgalabdham pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram mandaśīghroccayoḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6879: madhyamasya grahasya [ca] yat antarārdham tat madhyamāt mandoccasiddhe adhike madhyamagrahe dhanam, ūne ṛṇam
GS41aryabhcu:6881: etat eva karma “śanigurukujeṣu mande ardham ṛṇadhanam bhavati pūrvam” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:6884: mandāraguruṣu madhyameṣu madhyamakarmaṇā siddheṣu mandāraguruṣu iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6886: 22] iti kasya ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā bhavati iti atra sampradāyāvicchedāt mandasiddhamadhyamāntaram parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6888: dhanam ṛṇam vā pūrvasiddhe mandoccakarmaṇi bhavati?
GS41aryabhcu:6889: idam ca karma mandoccaśīghroccayoḥ sāmānyena prasiddham /
GS41aryabhcu:6891: tat yathā ã evam ardhena phalena saṃskṛtam madhyamam graham śīghroccāt grahāt viśodhayet /
GS41aryabhcu:6892: tatra kendrapadavibhāgena bhujākoṭijye gṛhītvā sphuṭīkṛtasvaśīghroccaparidhinā vyāsārdham
GS41aryabhcu:6893: saṃguṇayya aśītyā bhāgalabdhapratimaṇḍalabhūvivareṇa pūrvakarmaṇā eva saṃskṛtāt karṇam ānayet /
GS41aryabhcu:6896: tataḥ bhujajyayā vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya karṇena bhāgalabdhasya kāṣṭham śīghroccakendre prathamapade śīghroccāt apanīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6897: dvitīye pade ṣaḍbhyaḥ viśodhya śeṣam śīghroccāt apanīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6902: tasya mandoccasiddhasya ca pūrvavat eva antarārdham mandoccasiddhe pūrvakalpanayā
GS41aryabhcu:6904: tat mandaśīghra[siddha]m avinaṣṭam vidhāya tasmāt mandoccam viśodhya pūrvavat eva mandoccam sādhayet /
GS41aryabhcu:6905: tasya mandoccasiddhasya dvisaṃskṛtasya avinaṣṭasthāpitasya ca yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tam sakalam eva dvisaṃskṛtahīnamadhyamāt viśodhayet,
GS41aryabhcu:6907: [arthāt dvisaṃskṛtamandasiddhe ūne sati viśodhayet anyathā prakṣipet] /
GS41aryabhcu:6908: tam evaṃkṛtam śīghroccāt viśodhya śīghroccaprasiddhakarmaṇā saṃsiddhaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS41aryabhcu:6909: iti / etat eva karma saṃkṣepeṇa asmābhiḥ karmanibandhe uktam ã
GS41aryabhcu:6911: mandocce pūrvavat kuryāt śīghroccāt tat viśodhyate //
GS41aryabhcu:6912: tat eva kevalam śodhyam [cakrārdhāt śodhya tat calāt] /
GS41aryabhcu:6913: cakrārdhasaṃyutam cāpam cakrāt śuddham ca śeṣayoḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:6915: tyaktvā padeṣu yuktvā vā karṇaḥ prāgvat prasādhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6917: mandasiddhe adhike hīne rahitaḥ madhyamaḥ grahaḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:6918: sa śīghroccāt punar sādhyaḥ siddhayoḥ antarālajam /
GS41aryabhcu:6921: mandasiddhasya tasya ayam viśeṣaḥ yaḥ abhidhāsyate //
GS41aryabhcu:6923: prāgvat tat madhyame kṛtvā śīghrasiddhaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:6926: tena budhaśukrayoḥ api idam karma kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6931: kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnam ca tat svavṛttamadhyam ca kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnasvavṛttamadhyam /
GS41aryabhcu:6934: yaḥ asau madhyaḥ grahaḥ sa kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnasvavṛttamadhye bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:6935: etat uktam bhavati ã kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalayoḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra yaḥ asau madhyamagrahaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6943: mandoccāt prabhṛti yāni mandoccavṛttāni mandoccāt ārabhya anulomam gacchanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6946: śīghrāt śīghroccāt ārabhya yāni śīghroccavṛttāni tāni pratilomam gacchanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6948: atra idam praṣṭavyam ã katham vā mandoccakendram
GS41aryabhcu:6950: katham vā śīghroccakendram ahar ahar apacīyate iti?
GS41aryabhcu:6951: ucyate ã grahāt patite mandocce [mandakendra]bhuktayaḥ upacīyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6953: yadi evam grahāt śīghroccam na patati mahattvāt tarhi maṇḍalam prakṣipya pātyate iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6958: tatra grahabhagaṇebhyaḥ śīghroccabhagaṇāḥ eva tāvat na
GS41aryabhcu:6960: kutaḥ asau bhagaṇaḥ yam prakṣipya śīghroccam viśodhyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6961: tasmāt gaṇitayuktyā yāni api śīghravṛttāni tāni api anulomagāni eva /
GS41aryabhcu:6962: ācāryeṇa tu karaṇalāghavārtham “pratilomagāni vṛttāni” iti uktam /
GS41aryabhcu:6964: yadi grahaḥ śīghroccāt patati tadā grahaḥ śīghroccāt viśodhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6965: yadā ca śīghroccam grahāt patati tadā grahāt śīghroccam viśodhyate iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6969: viśodhitam bhavati tadā anyathā jyā anyathā paridhiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6970: tadānīm eva śīghroccāt viśuddhe grahe anyathā jyā anyathā eva paridhiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6971: atha manyate śīghroccaviśuddhe grahe yat prathamapadam tat caturthapadam,
GS41aryabhcu:6981: athavā kakṣyā ca sā maṇḍalam ca tat kakṣyāmaṇḍalam /
GS41aryabhcu:6986: tat ca sāmānyena mandavṛttam śīghravṛttam ca parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6992: tasmin svavṛtte yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale yathā madhyam bhavati tathā badhnīyāt /
GS41aryabhcu:6993: tasmin svavṛtte yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale jyā avitiṣṭhate tathā eva avatiṣṭhamānā draṣṭavyā /
GS41aryabhcu:6995: evam atra api ṣaṇṇavatyaṃśakā kāṣṭhajyā parikalpanīyā /
GS41aryabhcu:6996: tat yathā ã uccāt ārabhya bhujajyākoṭijyābhyām trairāśikam ã yadi ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaparidhau ime bhujajyākoṭijye,
GS41aryabhcu:6998: ke iti / athavā ã vyāsārdhena ime bhujajyākoṭijye,
GS41aryabhcu:7001: tatra prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ vyāsārdhāt upari koṭisādhanam sthitam iti vyāsārdhe prakṣipyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7002: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ vyāsārdhonam pravṛttam iti vyāsārdhāt apanīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7009: śanigurukujeṣu mandāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrve // 22 //
GS41aryabhcu:7011: kṣayaḥ ca dhanaḥ ca dhanaḥ ca kṣayaḥ ca kṣayadhanadhanakṣayāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7013: tat yathā ã prathame pade kṣayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7018: padakramaḥ ca kasmāt parigṛhyate iti āha ã mandoccāt pravṛttāt grahāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7019: kutaḥ? ucyate ã “mandoccāt” iyam pañcamī maryādābhidhāyinī /
GS41aryabhcu:7020: tataḥ mandoccāt iti anena mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7021: sa katham mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ jñeyaḥ?
GS41aryabhcu:7022: ucyate ã na atra kiñcit api jñeyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7023: yāvadbhiḥ mandoccāt adhikaḥ grahaḥ tavatā asau mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ jñeyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7027: tasmāt prathamapade yā kramajyā tasyāḥ phalam trairāśikena ānīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7029: tadā iṣṭagrahaparidheḥ kā iti phalam labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7038: punar tṛtīyapade krameṇa jyā vyavasthitā iti kramajyāphalam dhanam /
GS41aryabhcu:7039: caturthe pade utkrameṇa jyā vyavasthitā iti utkramajyāphalam kṣayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7041: tat utpannam eva phalam grahamadhye kṣayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7042: yadā dvitīyapade kendram tadā prathamapadavyāsārdhajyotpannam aśeṣaphalam kṣayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7045: athavā karaṇalāghavārtham evam kriyate ã prathamapade yat utpannam krameṇa jyāphalam kṣayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7046: dvitīyapade yat utpannam punar yat gatam rāśyādikam atītam prathamapadasaṃjñitarāśitrayāt
GS41aryabhcu:7047: kṣayātmakāt dhanātmakam tat dvitīyapadasya yat gatam tat viśodhya śeṣam tatra kṣayaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate,
GS41aryabhcu:7048: tena tat utpannam phalam madhyamagrahe kṣayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7049: evam dvitīyapadānte kṣayadhanayoḥ tulyatvāt na kiñcit avatiṣṭhate /
GS41aryabhcu:7054: tat etat prathamapade gatam bhujāsaṃjñitam dvitīyapade anāgatam /
GS41aryabhcu:7058: caturthapade tṛtīyapadarāśitrayāt dhanāt dhanasaṃjñitāt caturthapadarāśyādigatakṣayasaṃjñitam viśodhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7060: caturthapadānte dhanakṣayayoḥ tulyatvāt na kiṃcit avaśiṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7061: tasmāt atra api sa eva arthaḥ tulādikendre bhujāphalam dhanam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7063: yadi padeṣu sarveṣu tulyāḥ paridhayaḥ tadā evam syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7065: atulyeṣu ca paridhiṣu pratimaṇḍalasya ca api avasthā virudhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7073: nanu ca uktam ã na ca tulyāḥ paridhayaḥ paṭhyante
GS41aryabhcu:7075: evam vijñāyate ã ete paridhayaḥ upacayā[pacayā]tmakāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7079: tat yathā ã prathamapade kramajyām paridhyantareṇa hatvā vyāsārdhena labdham ūne viṣamapadaparidhau prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7086: athavā bhujāphalam śīghrakrameṇa ānītam meṣādau dhanam,
GS41aryabhcu:7089: atra śīghraphalam vyāsārdhena saṃguṇayya tat utpannakrarṇena bhāgalabdham phalam dhanam ṛṇam vā /
GS41aryabhcu:7090: etat ca karma trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhamaṇḍale idam phalam
GS41aryabhcu:7091: labhyate, tadā śīghroccakarṇamaṇḍale kiyat iti vyastatrairāśikena vyāsārdham guṇakāraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7094: ucyate ã “alpe hi maṇḍale alpāḥ mahati mahāntaḥ ca rāśayaḥ jñeyāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 14] iti anena /
GS41aryabhcu:7095: atha mandoccaphalam evam kasmāt na kriyate?
GS41aryabhcu:7096: ucyate ã kriyamāṇe api tāvat eva tat phalam bhavati iti na kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7098: tatra ca aviśeṣitena phalena vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya karṇena bhāge hṛte pūrvam
GS41aryabhcu:7100: atha kim iti śīghroccakarṇaḥ na aviśiṣyate?
GS41aryabhcu:7102: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya yathā svayojanakarṇaḥ vyāsārdhaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7104: pratimaṇḍalasya api etat eva vyāsārdham iti etat /
GS41aryabhcu:7107: atha manyate ã tatkālotpannabhujākoṭiniṣpannakarṇaḥ vyāsārdham pratimaṇḍalasya /
GS41aryabhcu:7110: iti / atra ucyate ã caturthapadādau kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale tulye /
GS41aryabhcu:7113: evam krameṇa upacīyamānam uccatulyagrahe svoccavṛttaviṣkambhārdham upacitam bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7114: tat eva prathamapadādau prabhṛti utkrameṇa apacīyamānam prathamapadānte vyāsārdham eva bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7115: evam krameṇa apacīyamānam dvitīyapadānte uccavṛttaviṣkambhārdham apacitam bhavati / tṛtīye
GS41aryabhcu:7116: [padānte] ca utkrameṇa upacīyamānam iti etat kakṣyāmaṇḍalavyāsārdham eva /
GS41aryabhcu:7117: grahasya uccanīcagatikramāt upacayāpacayātmakam bhavati iti ataḥ pratimaṇḍalasya upadeśaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7118: ghanabhūmadhyāt eva grahasya uccanīcaparijñānam iti ataḥ vyāsārdham eva koṭiphalena upacīyate apacīyate vā /
GS41aryabhcu:7119: atha yadi pratimaṇḍalamadhyāt vyāsārdhasya vṛddhihrāsau syātām /
GS41aryabhcu:7126: śaniḥ ca guruḥ ca kujaḥ ca śanigurukujāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7127: ataḥ teṣu śanigurukujeṣu mandāt mandoccāt prabhṛti ya[t phalam upapadyate] tat ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7130: śīghrāt api ca yat phalam tat teṣu ardham kriyate prathame śīghrakarmaṇi /
GS41aryabhcu:7131: anyatra dvitīyakarmaṇi mandaśīghrayoḥ sakalaphalam iti arthāt avasīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7132: mandaśīghraphalāni kāṣṭhāni ṛṇam dhanam vā parikalpyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7134: bhramati / tat phalam kva ṛṇam kva vā dhanam iti ã śanigurukujeṣu /
GS41aryabhcu:7138: yadi etat karma śanigurukujeṣu madhyameṣu kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7139: mandoccaphalārdhena madhyame ṛṇadhane kṛte tasya ṛṇadhanīkṛtasya madhyamatvam hīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7145: yathā devakattaḥ svalaṅkṛtaḥ api svam ākhyānam
GS41aryabhcu:7146: na jahāti, na ca karṇanāsāvacchedena api,
GS41aryabhcu:7148: dve karmaṇī tatra tatra eva madhyame kriyete /
GS41aryabhcu:7149: athavā prathamamadhyamāt mandoccāyātam phalārdham madhyamotpannatvāt madhyame kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7150: yat punar śīghroccāyātam sakṛtsaṃskṛtāt phalārdham tat sakṛtsaṃskṛtāyātam eva iti kṛtvā sakṛtsaṃskṛtaḥ eva kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7151: tasmāt dvikarmasaṃsiddhāt mandoccaphalam tat sakalam eva madhyame grahe kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7153: atha idam praṣṭavyam ã yat etat dvikarmasiddhamandoccāyātam tat dvikarmasaṃsiddhe eva kasmāt na kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7156: nanu ca dvikarmasiddhaḥ api madhyamaḥ eva /
GS41aryabhcu:7159: punar sphuṭamadhyamagrahaṇam kurvan ācāryaḥ jñāpayati avikṛtamadhyaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7162: mandoccāyātam tat sakalam eva madhyame grahe kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7164: sa evaṃkṛte sphuṭamadhyamaḥ śīghroccakarmaṇā sphuṭaḥ bhavati iti sphuṭamadhyame śīghroccaphaladhanuḥ sakalam kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7166: ṛṇadhanayuktipradarśanārtham vyāsārdhatulyena karkaṭakena samāyāmavanau samavṛttamaṇḍalam ālikhya mātṛpitṛrekhām kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7168: tanmaṇḍalakendrāt yāvatyaḥ abhīṣṭagrahāntyaphalaliptāḥ tāvati antare ca dakṣiṇena kendram kṛtvā vyāsārdhatulyena eva karkaṭakena tathā eva samavṛttamaṇḍalam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:7171: kakṣyāmaṇḍaladakṣiṇottararekhāsaṃpāte kendram kṛtvā ubhayatra vṛttadvayam ālikhya[te /
GS41aryabhcu:7173: tayoḥ yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale rāśijyāvikalpaḥ tathā karaṇīyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7174: prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt uparisthitatvāt pratimaṇḍalasya vyāsārdhe koṭisādhanam prakṣipya karṇaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7175: tāvat pramāṇam sūtram [pratimaṇḍalaparidhim] yatra spṛśati tatra sthāne sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7176: kakṣyāmaṇḍalajyā ca tasmāt purataḥ iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7181: tāvatpramāṇam sūtram kakṣyāmaṇḍalamadhyāt pratimaṇḍalaparidhim yatra spṛśati tatra sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7183: tena tat utpannam phalam dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ madhyamagrahāt upacīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7184: śīghrocce punar yeṣām kṣayadhanadhanakṣayāḥ syuḥ mandoccāt evam eva śīghroccāt iti ayam pāṭhaḥ teṣām iyam ṛṇadhanopapattiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7185: yeṣām punar vyatyayena śīghroccāt iti ayam pāṭhaḥ teṣām iyam eva upapattiḥ viparītā /
GS41aryabhcu:7188: punar kendrajyā tena prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitatvāt madhyamasya kendrajyāgrahasya ānīyamānasya kendrajyotpannam
GS41aryabhcu:7190: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitatvāt kendrajyāgrahasya tat phalam apanīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7193: tena yāvat bhūtārāgrahavivarapramāṇam sūtram kakṣyāmaṇḍalamadhyāt pratimaṇḍalaparidhim padavibhāgena prasāritam yatra spṛśati,
GS41aryabhcu:7195: anye punar anyathā paṭhanti ã śanigurukujeṣu mande ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrvam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7196: mande mandocce ardham phalasya ṛṇam dhanam,
GS41aryabhcu:7197: yadi tat grahe ṛṇam dhanam tadā tat mandocce dhanam ṛṇam iti arthāt avasīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7198: tatra kiyat tat phalam mandocce ṛṇam sat dhanam bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:7199: dhanam sat ṛṇam bhavati iti ucyate ã śīghroccaphalam yasmāt mandoccaphalam ca phaladvayam etat /
GS41aryabhcu:7203: kriyate / karmacatuṣṭayagrahaṇāt tat utpannam ca phalam tatra eva /
GS41aryabhcu:7204: tat yathā ã prāg eva śīghraphalam ānīya tat ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā mandocce kṛtvā tat mandāyātam ca tena phaladvayasaṃskṛtena mandoccena saṃskṛtaḥ sa sphuṭamadhyaḥ grahaḥ bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7205: sa śīghrakarmaṇā sphuṭaḥ iti prakriyāntaram etat // 22 //
GS41aryabhcu:7208: mandoccāt śīghroccāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam graheṣu mandeṣu /
GS41aryabhcu:7209: mandoccāt sphuṭamadhyāḥ śīghroccāt ca sphuṭāḥ jñeyāḥ // 23 //
GS41aryabhcu:7210: mandoccāt yat phalam āyātam tasya cāpārdham ṛṇam dhanam vā graheṣu ṛṇam dhanam [mandeṣu vā kartavyam] /
GS41aryabhcu:7212: cakāreṇa vinā graheṣu mandeṣu ca iti cārthaḥ na labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7216: bāle vṛddhe kṣate kṣīṇe kṣīram yuktyā prayojayet /
GS41aryabhcu:7217: iti atra cakāreṇa vinā cārthasya avagamanāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7220: yena sveṣu madhyameṣu sveṣu ca mandeṣu kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7222: svasya grahasya yaḥ madhyamaḥ svasya ca yat mandam tatra eva karmasiddheḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7224: na ca tatra ucyate ã “svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari” iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7226: atha yat etat mandoccāyātam phalārdham tat kṣayadhanakrameṇa madhye grahe dhanam ṛṇam vā kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7229: ucyate ã mandoccam sarvadā eva grahasya ṛṇabhūtam /
GS41aryabhcu:7230: tatra yat grahasya ṛṇam tat mandocce prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7232: yat grahe dhanabhūtam tat mandoccāt apanīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7235: ṛṇa[ṛṇayoḥ dhana]dhanayoḥ saṃkṣepaḥ ṛṇadhanayoḥ ca viśeṣaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7236: iti / tasmāt anena krameṇa mandocce phalārdhasya upacayāpacayau bhavataḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7237: śīghroccāt ca yat phalārdham tat api evam eva grahavaiparītyena mande dhanam ṛṇam vā kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7241: tena tādṛgvidhena mandena madhyamāt viśodhitena yat phalam āyātam tat sakalam madhyeṣu ṛṇam dhanam vā kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7244: na avikṛteṣu] madhyameṣu phalasya karaṇāt madhyamāḥJ/
GS41aryabhcu:7249: śīghroccāt āyātam phalam tena saṃskṛtāḥ sphuṭāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7254: śīghroccāt ardhonam kartavyam ṛṇam dhanam svamandocce /
GS41aryabhcu:7255: sphuṭamadhyau tu bhṛgubudhau siddhāt mandāt sphuṭau bhavataḥ // 24 //
GS41aryabhcu:7256: śīghroccāt iti prāk śīghroccaniṣpannam phalam gṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7258: tatra tat ardhonam ardham iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7260: yadi grahe ṛṇam tadā dhanam kartavyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7261: dhanasya ṛṇam kartavyam iti arthāt avasīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7267: yat eva śīghroccaphalārdhena saṃskṛtam mandoccam tat siddham
GS41aryabhcu:7270: etat uktam bhavati ã yat eta[t siddhamandam tat madhyama]grahāt viśodhya śeṣaphalasya ca ṛṇadhanena tayoḥ bhṛgubudhayoḥ madhyau sphuṭamadhyau bhavataḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7276: kakṣyāyām grahavegaḥ yaḥ bhavati sa mandanīcocce // 25 //
GS41aryabhcu:7277: tārāgrahāṇām bhuvaḥ ca yat antaram tasya ānayanopāyaḥ ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7278: bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhuvaḥ tārāgrahasya ca yat antaram tat bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhavati iti vakṣyati /
GS41aryabhcu:7283: etat uktam bhavati ã mandoccakarṇasya śīghroccakarṇasya ca yaḥ ghātaḥ saḥ svakarṇasaṃvargaḥ vyāsārdhahṛtaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7286: [kakṣyāyām] grahasya yaḥ mandaśīghroccaphalajanitaḥ vegaḥ sa tasya bhūtārāgrahavivarasya agre bhavati iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7288: apare āhuḥ ã na bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhāgahāraḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7290: yasmāt etat atra trairāśikam ã yadi trijyayā svagrahābhihitavikṣepaḥ labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7294: tadā nakṣatratārāgrahaśaśiyogāḥ sarvadā tasyām eva diśi tulyavikṣepavivarāḥ syuḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7298: yadi vyāsārdha]m eva bhāgahāraḥ syāt tadā sarve eva tulyagatayaḥ syuḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7300: bhūtārāgrahavivaravaśāt vikṣepaḥ alpaḥ mahān ca nakṣatratārāgrahayogeṣu labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7301: [alpe vā] mahadvikṣepe dakṣiṇottaradigvaśāt niyatavikṣepāntaradiśaḥ yogāḥ upapadyante /
GS41aryabhcu:7304: katham? yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā pātāntarabhujajyayā yathāsvam vikṣepaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7306: tadā ana[yā bhuja]jyayā pātāntarotpannayā kaḥ iti vikṣepaḥ labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7307: [ataḥ] punar api vyastatrairāśikam ã yadi ayam vikṣepaḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍale vyāsārdhaviṣkambhe labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7319: tatra api tayoḥ ūnādhikavikṣepavaśāt parasparāpekṣayā [tayoḥ yāmyottaradiktvam] /
GS41aryabhcu:7321: yasmāt ekaḥ apakramamaṇḍalāt dakṣiṇena aparaḥ uttareṇa,
GS41aryabhcu:7325: alpāḥ vā [syuḥ] tadā tayoḥ anyonyāśeṣāt chādanam ekadeśāt chādanam vā [bhavati] /
GS41aryabhcu:7326: tatra grahaṇavat iṣṭagrahasaṃparkārdhatadvikṣepa[viśleṣeṇa yogena vā] sthityardhanāḍikānayanam /
GS41aryabhcu:7328: atha nakṣatratārāgrahayogeṣu natilambanaparijñānārtham idam karma kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7330: 7] iti atra śaśiyojanakarṇaḥ ṅādibhiḥ guṇitaḥ śukrādīnām bhāgahārāḥ bhavanti iti vyākhyātam /

GS41aryabhcu:7348: mandanīcocce mandasya mandoccasya ucce nīce ca ānītaḥ mandakarṇaḥ eva anena vidhinā sphuṭīkṛtaḥ iti /

GS41aryabhcu:7361: atra ucyate ã ravyudayāt eva jyotiścakrādeḥ api

GS41aryabhcu:7364: yadā adhikaḥ tadā jyotiścakram bhujāphalaliptātulyam ravigatyā jīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7366: anayā parikalpanayā jyotiścakrasambandhinyaḥ tadā bhujāphalaliptāḥ bhavanti,
GS41aryabhcu:7369: ahargaṇāt āga]taḥ [sakalaḥ sūryaḥ] yadā svoccatulyaḥ tadā

GS41aryabhcu:7389: yathāsambhavam atra bhagaṇaḥ na sambhavati iti rāśyādayaḥ eva rāśyādibhyaḥ apanīyante /

GS41aryabhcu:7754: etat ca [na] ã yāvatā niṣkrāmataḥ praviśataḥ vā grahasya tulyam idam antaram,
GS41aryabhcu:7755: tena dṛśyena vā graheṇa bhavitavyam adṛśyena vā /
GS41aryabhcu:7756: sa tāvat iṣṭakālāṃśakaiḥ dṛśyaḥ eva upalabhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7760: eva bhāgaiḥ arkāntarasthitaḥ niṣkrāmat praviśat vā dṛśyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7761: ūnaiḥ ataḥ dṛśyate iti arthāt avagamyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7762: adhikaiḥ punar nitarām dṛśyate iti etat aśāstrajñaḥ api jānāti /
GS41aryabhcu:7764: tat yathā ã yadi triṃśatā svadeśarāśyudayakālaḥ labhyate tadā idānīm niṣpannārkagrahāntarabhāgaiḥ kaḥ iti,
GS41aryabhcu:7766: sa yadi abhīṣṭagrahāntarakālena tulyaḥ tadā asau grahaḥ dṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7769: athavā svadeśarāśyudayena triṃśatā ca trairāśikam kṛtvā sarvarāśiṣu antarabhāgānayanam ã yadi rāśyudayakālena triṃśadbhāgāḥ labhyante
GS41aryabhcu:7770: tadā iṣṭagrahāntarābhihitakālena kiyantaḥ iti sarvarāśiṣu antarabhāgāḥ labhyante /
GS41aryabhcu:7771: taiḥ vā sakṛtsiddhaiḥ eva antarabhāgaiḥ iṣṭadeśe grahasya darśanam vaktavyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7774: yasmāt udayarāśivaśāt eva astam rāśayaḥ gacchanti // 4 //
GS41aryabhcu:7782: bhūḥ ca grahāḥ ca bhāni ca bhūgrahabhāni,
GS41aryabhcu:7786: ataḥ teṣām golānām ardhāni golākāraśarīrārdhāni iti yāvat /
GS41aryabhcu:7788: bhuvam tāvat anye śakaṭākārām darpaṇavṛttākārām ca manyante /
GS41aryabhcu:7790: yathā golākārā bhūḥ pratipadyate tathā uttarataḥ vakṣyāmi /
GS41aryabhcu:7791: katham punar atra amī grahāḥ golākārāḥ pratipadyante?
GS41aryabhcu:7794: anyat ca ã sthityardhādiparilekhanaprakriyā ca golākāraśarīreṣu na ghaṭate /
GS41aryabhcu:7799: tasyāḥ dṛgviṣayatvāt yathādarśanagatāni eva bimbasaṃsthānāni aṅgīkṛtya ācāryeṇa uktam /
GS41aryabhcu:7800: athavā golākāreṣu api sthityardhādyupapattiḥ śakyate vaktum /
GS41aryabhcu:7801: yasmāt vikṣepādayaḥ bimbamadhyāt pravṛttāḥ tāvat jñātvā golakānām bimbārdham darpaṇavṛttākāraḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7802: iva yathā bhraman niṣpāditaḥ samudgataḥ tasyāḥ udaram darpaṇavṛttākāram eva upalakṣyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7806: anyathā hi candramasaḥ sitakṣayavṛddhī darpaṇavṛttākāre bimbe na saṃvadete /
GS41aryabhcu:7807: tasmāt golākāraśarīrāḥ ete / uktam ca ã
GS41aryabhcu:7808: sūryaḥ agnimayaḥ golaḥ candraḥ ambumayaḥ svabhāvataḥ svacchaḥ / iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7811: tayā svacchāyayā ardhāni eṣām [vivarṇāni aprakāśātmakāni kṛṣṇāni iti arthaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7813: yathā ghaṭasya ātapasthasya ekam pārśvam svacchāyayā eva vivarṇam,
GS41aryabhcu:7826: yadi ardhāni grahāṇām sūryābhimukhāni cakāsanti tadā kim iti candramasaḥ ardhabimbam sarvadā na cakāsti?
GS41aryabhcu:7829: ucyate ã amāvāsyāyām candramasaḥ upari ādityaḥ tadā tasya candramasaḥ upari yat bimbārdham tat aśeṣam avabhāsayati /
GS41aryabhcu:7830: candrasya amāvāsyopalakṣitoparibimbakendrāt yathā yathā paścāt ādityaḥ avalambate tathā tathā bimbakendram api aparataḥ avalambate /
GS41aryabhcu:7832: eva amāvāsyopalakṣitam bimbaparidhyardhāvadheḥ avalambate tāvat candramasaḥ bimbam asmābhiḥ upalakṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7834: sūryābhimukham api savitṛkarā[t chāditam api na dṛśyate] /
GS41aryabhcu:7835: tasmāt yāvat yāvat candramasaḥ bimbam savitṛbimbāt ślakṣṇam avalambate tāvān svacchaḥ candramasaḥ śuklaḥ upalakṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7837: tena tarhi savitṛmarīcayaḥ tu sa[lila]maye svabhāvāt eva [svaccha]candrabimbe
GS41aryabhcu:7839: yathā darpaṇe jale vā divasakarāḥ sammūrcchitāḥ santaḥ gṛhāntargatam tamaḥ kṣapayanti /
GS41aryabhcu:7841: anyat ca ã yaḥ yaḥ candrabimbapradeśāḥ savitṛmārge ṛjutvena vyavasthitaḥ sa eva śṛṅgonnatau upalabhyate, na itaraḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7842: tathā ca tat jijñāsavaḥ karma kurvanti /
GS41aryabhcu:7843: tat yathā ã śuklapratipadādiṣu sūryārdhāstamayakālikau sūryācandramasau kṛtvā sūryonacandrotkramajyā gṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7847: tena tayā utkramajyayā trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā utkramajyayā
GS41aryabhcu:7851: śuklāṣṭamyāḥ parataḥ yā sitavṛddhiḥ sā kramajyāvaśāt upacīyamānā lakṣyate iti kramajyā gṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7852: tāḥ kramajyāḥ pūrvopacitavyāsārdhajyāsu prakṣipya trairāśikam kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7853: athavā ã tābhiḥ eva kramajyābhiḥ candrabimbārdhena trairāśikam kṛtvā yat labdham candrabimbārdhe prakṣiptam sitamānam bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7856: tena sūryācandramasoḥ viśeṣāt rāśiṣaṭkam apanīya tathā eva karma kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7858: darśanakālaḥ hi yāvantam kālam candraḥ dṛśyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7859: yavatā kālena udeti tat ānayanopāyaḥ ã śuklapakṣe tāvat udayarāśivaśāt eva jyotiścakragatiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7860: iti ataḥ yāvantaḥ sūryāt candrarāśibhāgāḥ tāvantaḥ eva udayāvadheḥ svadeśarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ parigṛhyante /
GS41aryabhcu:7861: tat yathā ã āstamayike savitari ṣaḍrāśayaḥ parikṣipyante sa sūryāt saptamaḥ rāśiḥ bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7862: tathā ca candramasi ṣaḍrāśayaḥ parikṣipya sūryagatarāśibhāgān triṃśatā viśodhayet śeṣam sūryasya āgatarāśibhāgaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7866: sūryāgatarāśibhāgān ca ṣaḍrāśiyutasūrye prakṣipya tāvat svadeśarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ saṃkalanīyāḥ yāvat ṣaḍrāśiyutacandragatāḥ bhāgāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7867: tataḥ ṣaḍrāśiyutacandragatāḥ bhāgāḥ tat rāśyudayaprāṇaiḥ saṅguṇya triṃśatā vibhajet,
GS41aryabhcu:7869: tān pūrvasaṅkalitaprāṇān ca sarvān ekatra nyastaprāṇeṣu prakṣipya ṣaḍbhiḥ bhāgaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7872: tāvatā kālena sūryācandramasoḥ gativiśeṣaḥ asti iti aviśeṣakarma pravartate /
GS41aryabhcu:7873: tat yathā ã yadi ṣaṣṭyā ghaṭikābhiḥ sūryabhuktiḥ candrabhuktiḥ vā labhyate tataḥ anena darśanakālena te kiyatyau tayoḥ bhuktī iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7875: candrabhuktilabdham api ṣaḍrāśiyutacandramasi prakṣipya tāvat idam kuryāt yāvat aviśeṣaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7876: tatra yaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ kālaḥ sa darśanakālaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7879: yaḥ ca ṣaḍrāśiyuktaḥ candraḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tasmāt cakrārdham apanayet tāvān candraḥ darśanakālaparisamāptau astam eti /
GS41aryabhcu:7880: atha kaścit yadi kiyatā kālena a[na]stamite savitari candrodayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti etat jijñāsuḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7882: tat yathā ã avikṛtāstamayakālādityabhāgebhyaḥ prabhṛti tāvat prāṇāḥ saṃkalanīyāḥ yāvat avikṛtaśītāṃśoḥ gatabhāgaprāṇāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7888: nāḍīnām yaḥ yaḥ bhogaḥ tena adhikau sūryācandramasau iti ataḥ tābhyām apanīya apanīya aviśeṣaḥ kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7889: aviśeṣitaḥ darśanakālaḥ tāvatā kālena divasaśeṣaḥ eva candrodayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7890: yaḥ asau aviśiṣṭaḥ candraḥ tāvān tatra divasaśeṣodayakāle candraḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7891: athavā prathamānītadivasaśeṣacandrodayakālena candramasaḥ bhuktim saṅguṇayya ṣaṣṭyā vibhajet /
GS41aryabhcu:7895: tat udayalagnam tena divasaśeṣoditacandreṇa tulyam yadā,
GS41aryabhcu:7897: atha yadi tasmāt lagnāt ūnaḥ candraḥ tadā prathamataram uditaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7900: teṣām ca prāṇānām yāvatī candrabhuktiḥ trairāśikena labhyate tāvatī prathamadivasaśeṣoditakālacandrāt viśodhyate tāvān candraḥ divasaśeṣoditaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7902: candraḥ ca yadā adhikaḥ tadā pūrvavat tadantaraprāṇān divasaśeṣakāle prakṣipet tāvatām prāṇānām candrabhogam candramasi prakṣipet,
GS41aryabhcu:7904: athavā prathamāstamayikacandrāt eva antarotpannadivasaśeṣakālabhogaḥ candramasaḥ viśodhya tat kālalagnakrameṇa
GS41aryabhcu:7906: atha yadi udayalagnāt candraḥ adhikaḥ tadā [kiyan]nāḍyā abhyudeti candraḥ iti tadantaraprāṇān prathamānītadivasaśeṣe prakṣipet /
GS41aryabhcu:7907: tat bhuktim candramasi prakṣipet tāvat yāvat aviśeṣaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7908: evam udayalagnam candraḥ ca kṛtaḥ bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:7911: paurṇamāsyām punar tāvat eva antaraghaṭikāḥ yadi dinapramāṇaghaṭikābhyaḥ ūnāḥ bhaveyuḥ tadā anastamite āditye candrodayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7914: ubhayatra api antarakālapramāṇena aviśeṣakarma anantarakarmavat eva /
GS41aryabhcu:7916: śeṣa[ghaṭikā]bhiḥ bhukiḥ trairāśikena sūryācandramasau sañcārya punar tayoḥ antaraghaṭikābhyaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7918: śeṣaghaṭikābhiḥ candrādityau tadantarālaghaṭikāḥ iti ādyaviśeṣāntam karma kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7919: tatra aviśiṣṭena kālena [sūryāstamayāt paścāt candrodayaḥ / evam
GS41aryabhcu:7920: eva aviśiṣṭena kālena] sūryodayāt prāk candrodayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7921: atha anastamite savitari kiyatā kālena candraḥ astam yāsyati iti etat jijñāsuḥ idam karma kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7922: tat yathā ã sūryodayakālotpannam candramasam kṛtvā tatra rāśiṣaṭkam prakṣipet /
GS41aryabhcu:7924: atha audayikāt ādityāt ṣaḍrāśiyuktaniśākarāvadheḥ svadeśarāśyudayavidhānena yāvatyaḥ ghaṭikāḥ tāḥ aviśeṣyante /
GS41aryabhcu:7925: katham? tāsām trairāśikena yāvat candramasaḥ bhuktiḥ tām candramasi prakṣipet iti ataḥ punar api tasmāt ādityāt
GS41aryabhcu:7926: ṣaḍrāśiyuktacandrāvadheḥ pūrvavat ghaṭikāḥ tāvat yāvat aviśeṣaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7927: tatra yāḥ aviśeṣitāḥ ghaṭikāḥ tāvatībhiḥ divase vyatītābhiḥ candraḥ astam eti /
GS41aryabhcu:7929: atra yaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ candraḥ sa tasmin kāle tāvān,
GS41aryabhcu:7930: yaḥ ca ṣaḍrāśiyuktaḥ candraḥ sa tasmin kāle udayalagnam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7932: atha kaścit kiyatā kālena śuklāṣṭamyā parataḥ candraḥ gaganamadhyam avagāhate,
GS41aryabhcu:7933: kiyān vā tatra candraḥ iti jijñāsuḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7935: atha tatkālāt parataḥ svadhiyā āsannau madhyalagnaniśākarau abhyūhya,
GS41aryabhcu:7936: tatra yadi madhyalagnaniśākarau tulyau syātām tadā tāvān candraḥ tāvatā eva kālena gaganamadhyam ārokṣyati /
GS41aryabhcu:7937: atha yadi adhikaḥ candraḥ tadā na adya api prāpnoti gaganamadhyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7939: prakṣipya madhyalagnacandrau kuryāt yāvat tulyau iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7940: atha madhyalagnāt ūnaḥ candraḥ tadā tadantarālakālam svadhiyā abhyūhita[kālāt viśodhya] madhyalagnacandrau tāvat kuryāt yāvat madhyalagnacandrau tulyau syātām /
GS41aryabhcu:7946: sa ca antarālataḥ sūryāgrayā saha ekadikkam viśeṣyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7947: yataḥ arkāt eva uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā candraḥ sādhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7951: evam pariniṣṭhitapramāṇam bhujā sūryāt yāmya uttarāyatā prasāryate /
GS41aryabhcu:7954: uttareṇa candraḥ tadā bhujottarāgrataḥ pūrvāparāyatā prasāryate /
GS41aryabhcu:7955: yadā dakṣiṇena candraḥ sūryāt tadā tasyāḥ bhujāyāḥ dakṣiṇāgrataḥ pūrvāparāyatā /
GS41aryabhcu:7956: evam bhujakoṭī yathāgatapramāṇena vinyasya bhujākoṭimastakāvagāhī karṇaḥ dūranirgatāgraḥ prasārya koṭyagrakarṇasampāte kendram viracya candrabimbam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:7957: tasya candrabimbaparidheḥ aparataḥ karṇānusāreṇa sitamānam nītvā bindum kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7961: tataḥ tābhyām pūrvavihitabindunā ca tathā chedyakavidhānena tat bindutrayaśiraḥspṛgvṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:7962: tasya vṛttasya candrabimbaparidheḥ ca yat antaram tat candramasaḥ śuklaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7967: tatra yathāgatam sitamānam candrabimbapramāṇāt viśodhyam śeṣam asitam bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7968: tatkarṇānusāreṇa candraparidhipūrvabhāgāt bimbāntare asitamānam nītvā bindum kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7969: tena dakṣiṇottarabindubhyām ca pūrvavat bindutrayaśiraḥspṛgvṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:7972: kṛṣṇapratipadādiṣu ca aparābhimukhaprasāritakoṭikarṇāgralikhitacandraparidhyaparabhāgāt karṇānusāreṇa asitam antaḥ pūrvavat vṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:7973: iṣṭakāle tu yathā pratyāsannāstodayalagnajyām arkāgrām parikalpya tatkālacandraśaṅkvagram āpādya iṣṭalagnacandrāntaraprāṇotpannaśaṅkukoṭyā candraḥ parilekhanīyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7974: evam sarvatra kṣitijāt upari vyavasthitasya candrasya parilekhanaprakriyā /
GS41aryabhcu:7977: tat yathā ã samyak prasiddhagṛhodare pūrvāpararekhātaḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā parikalpitāṅgulapramāṇam arkāgrāsūtram pūrvavat prasārya bindum kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7979: pūrvāpararekhāyāḥ eva dakṣiṇottarataḥ candrāgrataḥ śaṅkvagrayoḥ yogaviśeṣajyāṅgulatulyam sūtram yathā āgatadiśam prasārya bindum kuryāt
GS41aryabhcu:7984: tatra śaṅkvagrāyatadaṇḍaśirasi yathālikhitam tat chedyakasitaśṛṅgonnatim arkabindunyastadṛṣṭiḥ karṇānusāreṇa utkṣiptāvalambakāṅgulapramāṇamastakāsaktam śaśalakṣmāṇam paśyati /
GS41aryabhcu:7985: evam eva grahāḥ api gṛhodaravyavasthitaiḥ darśanīyāḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7987: kṣitijamaṇḍalākrāntārdhabimbasya candramasaḥ koṭeḥ abhāvāt na parilikhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7989: tat yathā ã yadi candrāgrā dakṣiṇena udayajyā uttareṇa tadā candramasaḥ uttaraśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7991: bhavṛttacandrānusāreṇa ca sūryamarīcayaḥ candrabimbam karṇagatyā avagāhante /
GS41aryabhcu:7992: yadā punar candrāgrā uttareṇa udayajyā dakṣiṇena tadā candramasaḥ dakṣiṇaśṛṅgam
GS41aryabhcu:7997: candrāgrā yadā atiricyate tadā candramasaḥ uttaraśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7999: uttareṇa yadā candrāgrā atiricyate tadā dakṣiṇaśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8001: yadā punar viśeṣeṇa na kiñcit antaram tadā yugapat ubhayaśṛṅgadarśanam /
GS41aryabhcu:8002: yadā ca udayajyā candrāgre na bhavataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:8003: tadā ca astamaye candramasaḥ astalagnajyayā candrāgrayā ca śṛṅgasya prāk paścāt vā astamayam parikalpanīyam /
GS41aryabhcu:8007: tasya ekau raśmiḥ candramasam prati dīpyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8014: iti api ca nigamaḥ bhavati iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8015: tasmāt etena eva liṅgena candramārgāt upari sūryamārgaḥ iti,
GS41aryabhcu:8017: pariśiṣṭāḥ ca tārāgrahāḥ sūryamārgāt upari dūreṇa vyavasthitāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8018: tena teṣām ārātsthitāni golārdhāni sarvadā sakalāni eva cakāsate /
GS41aryabhcu:8019: ūrdhvamukhāḥ sūryamarīcayaḥ sadā ārādbhāgam prakāśayanti iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8020: budhaśukrayoḥ ca pratyāsannavartitvāt sarvataḥ bimbam avagāhante arkamarīcayaḥ pradīpapratyāsannagolavat tena tayoḥ api asakalabimbatābhāvaḥ / yadi
GS41aryabhcu:8021: evam astamite savitari katham ete grahādayaḥ cakāsate savitṛkarābhāvāt ?
GS41aryabhcu:8024: tena uparimukhānām sūryamarīcīnām na vyavadhānāya bhūḥ vartate /
GS41aryabhcu:8025: yathā ghaṭasya upari adhaḥ dūreṇa avasthitasya pradīpasya ghaṭaḥ na vyavadhānakāraṇam /
GS41aryabhcu:8026: kṛṣṇapakṣapratipadādiṣu candramasaḥ bimbapūrvabhāgaḥ pratyāsannaḥ savituḥ iti tena tat śuklam upalabhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8027: ratnānām ca ādityakarāḥ eva dīptikāraṇatvam prapadyate / tena tāni
GS41aryabhcu:8030: bhānoḥ ca bhāsām anuvedhayogam āsādya raśmiprakareṇa dūram /
GS41aryabhcu:8031: pārśvāṇi sarvāṇi anurañjayanti guṇaiḥ upetāḥ sphaṭik[ādayaḥ hi] //
GS41aryabhcu:8032: [yat] upākhyānādiṣu ratnāni eva dhvāntam dhvaṃsayanti iti śrūyate tat upākhyāna[m arthavādamātra]m eva /
GS41aryabhcu:8036: tasya śuklasya candramasaḥ savitṛsannikarṣāt vaivarṇyam bhavati iti /

GS41aryabhcu:8972: yadā punar bhūcchāyā grāhakatvena kalpitā tadā vikṣepasya digviparyayaḥ /

GS41aryabhcu:8988: samamaṇḍalamadhyāt dakṣiṇena akṣatulye antare pūrvāparāyatamaṇḍalasya [nāḍīmaṇḍalasya] yat antaram tat akṣavalanam /
GS41aryabhcu:8990: etat ānayanam ã samamaṇḍalamadhyāt natasya utkramajyayā kartavyam /

GS41aryabhcu:9005: vyāsārdhamaṇḍale dakṣiṇena uttareṇa vā apamaṇḍalagatyā [paścimabhāge] valanam vidhāya bindum kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:9007: sūtrasya mānaikyārdhaparidheḥ yatra sampātaḥ tasmāt uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vikṣepam ca apagatyā paridhyanusāreṇa nītvā agre bindum kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:9009: yatra grāhyabimbam spṛśati tatra raveḥ aparabhāge sparśaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:9032: tanmānaikyārdhavṛttasampātāt kendraprāpi sūtram nītvā rekhām kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:9040: pragrahaṇamadhyamokṣavikṣepabindutrayeṇa matsyadvayam utpādya tanmukhapucchanirgatasūtrasampātāt bindutrayaspṛksūtreṇa vṛttam bhrāmayet /
GS41aryabhcu:9042: tatra iṣṭagrāsakarṇapramāṇam [sūtram] kendrāt yathādiśam grāhakamārgābhimukham prasārya yatra grāhakamārgam spṛśati tasmāt grāhakārdhena parilekhāt tatkālakhaṇḍagrahaṇam dṛśyate /
GS41aryabhcu:9043: nimīlanonmīlanayoḥ vimardārdhaliptābhiḥ iṣṭagrāsavat karṇam ānīya iṣṭagrāsavidhinā nimīlanonmīlane darśayitavye // 45 //
